title: Navigating the Knowledge Problem in the Era of Open AI and Polycentric Governance
affiliations: Stanford University and University of Pittsburgh

detail.title: Navigating the Knowledge Problem in the Era of Open AI and Polycentric Governance
detail.abstract: Generative AI systems have revolutionized content creation, data analysis, and decisionmaking. Yet, they remain constrained by their inability to capture the dispersed, context-specific knowledge emphasized by Friedrich Hayek. This paper examines the "knowledge problem" in the realm of AI, explaining how large language models and other generative technologies operate on aggregated datasets that overlook tacit insights crucial for dynamic, real-world adaptation. Drawing on Elinor Ostrom's concept of polycentric governance, we propose a framework in which decentralized decision centers manage AI development and oversight collaboratively. Such an approach preserves local autonomy while facilitating cross-community learning, helping to mitigate risks related to bias amplification, single points of failure, and systemic fragility. We use real-world examples to show how polycentric structures can foster innovation, resilience, and ethical deployment of AI. By coupling the computational power of AI with decentralized, context-rich governance, society can harness emerging technologies without sacrificing the local knowledge and human creativity that underpin genuine progress.

AI.tldr: 本文探讨了生成式AI系统在知识分散性和上下文特异性方面的局限性，提出基于Elinor Ostrom的多中心治理框架，以解决AI开发中的偏见、单点故障和系统性脆弱性问题。
AI.research_question: 生成式AI系统如何克服知识分散性和上下文特异性的局限性，以实现更动态和适应性的应用？
AI.motivation: 生成式AI系统虽然强大，但无法捕捉Friedrich Hayek强调的分散、上下文特异性知识，导致在动态现实世界中的适应性不足。
AI.theoretical_framework: 结合Friedrich Hayek的知识分散理论和Elinor Ostrom的多中心治理理论。
AI.method: 提出一个基于多中心治理的框架，通过分散决策中心协作管理AI开发和监督。
AI.findings: 多中心治理框架有助于减少偏见放大、单点故障和系统性脆弱性，同时促进创新和伦理AI部署。
AI.theory_contributions: 将多中心治理理论应用于AI领域，为AI开发提供新的理论视角。
AI.practical_contributions: 为实际AI开发提供了一种分散化、协作化的治理模式，增强AI的适应性和伦理合规性。

title: Building Value: Hedonic Pricing Analysis of Energy Performance Ratings and House Prices in Dublin, Ireland
affiliations: affiliation not provided to SSRN, University College Dublin and University College Dublin

detail.title: Building Value: Hedonic Pricing Analysis of Energy Performance Ratings and House Prices in Dublin, Ireland
detail.abstract: Building energy performance is a key metric in the context of decarbonising the built environment sector. Improving the energy efficiency and energy performance of homes will entail major investment decisions for governments, housing bodies and individuals. Investigating the relationship between house prices and Energy Performance Certificate ratings can inform the decision-making process for those energy efficiency investments, as well as the design and evaluation of home retrofit programmes and supports. Utilising a hedonic pricing methodology, this paper examines the influence of energy efficiency attributes on the price of housing in Dublin, Ireland. The analysis is applied to a data set of over 11,000 properties in which property prices from 2019-2022 are linked to factors pertaining to the quality and location of the property as well as the Irish BER system. The model assesses the monetary value of an uplift in BER, while controlling for factors relating to the home’s size, quality and location as well as the time of sale. Results indicate that a 10% improvement in BER performance is associated with a 0.6% increase in price. This relationship equates to a price premium of 2.6% for A and B rated homes as compared to D rated homes. In the context of an average 3-bed semi-detached home in Dublin, this translates to €12,200 of added capital value with consequent relevance for individual investment decisions and policy support strategies.

AI.tldr: 本文通过享乐定价法研究了爱尔兰都柏林住房市场中能源效率属性对房价的影响，发现能源性能证书（BER）评分的提升与房价上涨相关。
AI.research_question: 能源效率属性如何影响爱尔兰都柏林住房的价格？
AI.motivation: 建筑能源性能是建筑环境脱碳的关键指标，研究房价与能源性能证书评级的关系可为能效投资决策和政策设计提供依据。
AI.theoretical_framework: 享乐定价理论。
AI.method: 基于11,000多套房产的数据集，采用享乐定价法分析BER评分对房价的影响，并控制房屋大小、质量、位置和销售时间等因素。
AI.findings: BER性能提升10%与房价上涨0.6%相关；A和B级房屋比D级房屋溢价2.6%，相当于都柏林平均三床半独立房屋增加12,200欧元的资本价值。
AI.theory_contributions: 验证了享乐定价理论在能源效率与房价关系中的应用。
AI.practical_contributions: 为个人投资决策和政策支持策略提供了量化依据，支持能效改造计划的评估与设计。

title: Differential Item-Functioning in the Eysenck Neuroticism Scale and its Implications on the Concurrent and Predictive Validity of the Neuroticism Construct
affiliations: University of Oxford, University of Oxford and University of Oxford

detail.title: Differential Item-Functioning in the Eysenck Neuroticism Scale and its Implications on the Concurrent and Predictive Validity of the Neuroticism Construct
detail.abstract: Background:Gender differences in neuroticism are well documented, including on the Eysenck Personality Questionnaire (EPQ-RN), but may reflect measurement bias. This study examined gender-based differential item functioning (DIF) in the EPQ-RN and its impact on predicting cognition.Methods:We analysed data from 13,573 UK Biobank participants using logistic regression DIF analyses. Items were classified as bias-free, female-endorsed, or male-endorsed. Associations with cognition were assessed via regression and structural equation modelling.Results:Ten of 12 items showed significant DIF, six favouring females. Females still scored higher on bias-free neuroticism. Bias-free and female neuroticism predicted poorer cognition cross-sectionally; longitudinal effects were non-significant.Conclusion:The EPQ-RN exhibits gender-based DIF, but genuine gender differences in neuroticism persist after removing biased items. Predictive validity for cognition remained consistent.

AI.tldr: 本研究通过分析英国生物银行数据，发现Eysenck人格问卷（EPQ-RN）中10/12项存在性别差异测量偏差，但去除偏差后仍存在真实的性别差异。神经质对认知的预测效度保持一致。
AI.research_question: EPQ-RN是否存在性别差异测量偏差（DIF）？这种偏差如何影响神经质对认知的预测？
AI.motivation: 尽管神经质的性别差异已被广泛记录，但可能反映测量偏差而非真实差异，需验证其对认知预测的影响。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于Eysenck人格理论和测量偏差（DIF）分析方法。
AI.method: 使用逻辑回归DIF分析13,573名英国生物银行参与者的数据，并通过回归和结构方程模型评估与认知的关联。
AI.findings: 10/12项显示显著DIF（6项偏向女性），但去除偏差后女性神经质仍更高。偏差无关和女性神经质横向预测较差认知，纵向效应不显著。
AI.theory_contributions: 证实EPQ-RN存在性别DIF，但真实性别差异仍存在，扩展了人格测量偏差的理论。
AI.practical_contributions: 为神经质测量工具的使用和性别差异研究提供实践指导，强调需控制测量偏差。

title: Nusantara Sea Salt Blueprint (Nssb): Blueprint for Indonesian Salt Independence 2029
affiliations: Universitas Trunojoyo Madura, affiliation not provided to SSRN, affiliation not provided to SSRN, affiliation not provided to SSRN, Universitas Trunojoyo Madura, Universitas Trunojoyo Madura, Universitas Indonesia and affiliation not provided to SSRN

detail.title: Nusantara Sea Salt Blueprint (Nssb): Blueprint for Indonesian Salt Independence 2029
detail.abstract: Despite its extensive coastline, Indonesia faces significant-challenges in salt self-sufficiency. It remains dependent on imports, posing crucial maritime-policy challenges for national resource-management and the livelihoods of coastal-communities. This study proposes the "Nusantara-Sea-Salt-Blueprint (NSSB)," a comprehensive policy blueprint aimed at achieving salt self-sufficiency by 2029. NSSB integrates two main strategies: the People's Salt Economy Center (SEGAR) economic cluster and the Flagship-Research-Program. SEGAR aims to modernize production, strengthen institutions where currently only 35% of sampled farmers are cooperative members, and encourage downstream industries. Meanwhile, Flagship-Research focuses on applied innovations to improve productivity, quality, and added value. This study uses a mixed-methods approach (quantitative and qualitative) to analyze industry conditions and challenges through statistical, policy, and primary data. The analysis results show significant potential for improvement through technology; the productivity of geomembrane ponds (averaging 105.3 tons/ha/season) is significantly higher than that of traditional methods (65.8 tons/ha/season). Institutional-factors such as cooperative-membership are also significant (Odds-Ratio 4.482) in driving technology-adoption. Geospatial-mapping successfully identified 15,500 hectares of potential land categorized as Highly-Suitable (S1) for the development of SEGAR clusters in 10-target-provinces. The NSSB detailed the SEGAR development strategy, including strengthening cooperatives and modernizing infrastructure, and formulated a roadmap for Flagship-Research, prioritizing the adoption of high TRL technology, product diversification, and sustainable practices. The integration of SEGAR and Flagship Research is expected to create synergy, accelerating salt self-sufficiency and sustainable industrial development. The NSSB offers strategic-guidance for stakeholders in Indonesia and has the potential to serve as a policy-model for other countries facing similar challenges.

AI.tldr: 本研究提出“Nusantara-Sea-Salt-Blueprint (NSSB)”政策蓝图，旨在通过整合SEGAR经济集群和旗舰研究计划，到2029年实现印尼盐业自给自足。
AI.research_question: 如何通过综合政策蓝图实现印尼盐业自给自足？
AI.motivation: 印尼依赖盐进口，对海洋资源管理和沿海社区生计构成挑战。
AI.theoretical_framework: 政策整合、技术创新、机构强化。
AI.method: 混合方法（定量与定性），包括统计分析、政策研究和实地数据。
AI.findings: 技术改进潜力显著（如geomembrane池塘生产力更高），机构因素（如合作社成员）对技术采用有显著影响。
AI.theory_contributions: 提出NSSB框架，整合经济集群与研究计划，为政策制定提供理论支持。
AI.practical_contributions: 为印尼盐业自给自足提供具体策略，可作为其他国家的政策参考。

title: Exploring the Impact of Omnichannel Service Attributes on Consumer Well-Being Across the Customer Journey
affiliations: National Chung Cheng University and Chihlee University of Technology

detail.title: Exploring the Impact of Omnichannel Service Attributes on Consumer Well-Being Across the Customer Journey
detail.abstract: In the wake of the booming development of retail, retailers have embraced emerging technologies to offer new types of omnichannel service attributes (OSA). However, the nature of the OSA that is conducive to consumers' well-being is still unknown. The study aimed to identify OSA at various touchpoints and examine how their contributions to satisfaction using the Tetraclasse model. After collecting 698 valid samples, the study classified, via correspondence analysis, OSA into four categories and identified their contributions to satisfaction in different stages of the customer journey. The findings can be references for retailers in making their operational deployments along the customer journey.

AI.tldr: 研究探讨了零售业中新兴技术带来的全渠道服务属性（OSA）如何影响消费者福祉，并通过Tetraclasse模型分析了不同接触点的OSA对满意度的贡献。
AI.research_question: 全渠道服务属性（OSA）中哪些类型对消费者福祉有积极影响？
AI.motivation: 随着零售业的快速发展，新兴技术的应用带来了新的全渠道服务属性，但其对消费者福祉的具体影响尚不明确。
AI.theoretical_framework: Tetraclasse模型用于分类和分析OSA对满意度的贡献。
AI.method: 通过收集698份有效样本，采用对应分析法将OSA分为四类，并分析其在客户旅程不同阶段对满意度的贡献。
AI.findings: 研究将OSA分为四类，并明确了它们在客户旅程不同阶段对满意度的具体贡献。
AI.theory_contributions: 丰富了全渠道服务属性对消费者福祉影响的理论研究。
AI.practical_contributions: 为零售商在客户旅程中的运营部署提供了参考依据。

title: Cash for Commuting: Behavioral and Environmental Impacts of California's Parking Cash-Out Policy
affiliations: California State University, Dominguez Hills, University of Kentucky, California State University Dominguez Hills, California State University Dominguez Hills, California State University Dominguez Hills and affiliation not provided to SSRN

detail.title: Cash for Commuting: Behavioral and Environmental Impacts of California's Parking Cash-Out Policy
detail.abstract: We assess potential impacts of California parking cash-out policy reform, which requires some employers with 50+ employees to offer the choice of cash instead of subsidized parking. Policy reform to include employers with 20+ employees could increase coverage of Bay Area and Southern California employees from 11% to 18%. An experimental design survey of 963 California residents exploring the factors influencing willingness to accept parking cashout, its perceived value, and commuting decisions suggests 76% of employees would accept cash-out if offered, and that full-time commuters paying market-rate parking more likely to switch to public transit at lower cash minimums. Daily VMT from employees covered by parking cash-out are substantial (5.6 million in Bay Area; 5.7 million in Los Angeles County), and account for a combined 6,593 daily tons of GHG. Parking cash-out could be more cost-effective at reducing VMT than traditional transportation demand management programs, though further evidence is needed.

AI.tldr: 加州停车现金返还政策改革可能将覆盖范围从50人以上企业扩大到20人以上企业，使湾区及南加州员工覆盖率从11%提升至18%。调查显示76%员工愿意接受现金返还，且支付市场停车费的全职通勤者更易转向公共交通。政策可能比传统交通需求管理更有效减少车辆里程（VMT）及温室气体排放。
AI.research_question: 加州停车现金返还政策改革对员工通勤行为、车辆里程（VMT）及温室气体排放的影响如何？
AI.motivation: 评估政策改革对交通行为及环境的潜在影响，探索其成本效益。
AI.theoretical_framework: 交通需求管理理论、行为经济学理论。
AI.method: 实验设计调查（963名加州居民），分析政策覆盖范围及员工反应。
AI.findings: 政策覆盖范围扩大可提高员工覆盖率；76%员工愿接受现金返还；全职通勤者更易转向公共交通；政策可能更有效减少VMT及排放。
AI.theory_contributions: 验证停车现金返还政策在行为经济学及交通需求管理中的有效性。
AI.practical_contributions: 为政策制定者提供扩大政策覆盖范围的依据，优化交通需求管理策略。

reference: IMF Working Paper No. 2025/154
title: Ramsey-Optimal Fiscal Spending and Reserve Accumulation Policies Under Volatile Aid
affiliations: University of Glasgow, Academia Sinica and International Monetary Fund (IMF)

detail.title: Ramsey-Optimal Fiscal Spending and Reserve Accumulation Policies Under Volatile Aid

publicationDetails.journalName: International Monetary Fund (IMF) Research Paper Series

detail.abstract: This paper examines Ramsey-optimal policies related to fiscal spending and international reserve accumulation in response to volatile aid flows in Low-Income Countries (LICs). We develop a real Dynamic Stochastic General Equilibrium (DSGE) model of a small open economy, incorporating government transfers and public investment as fiscal spending components, along with two prominent characteristics of LICs: Dutch disease (DD) externalities and financially constrained households. Driven by considerations of precautionary saving, Ramsey-optimal policies involve partial reserve accumulation and partial fiscal spending of aid. Stronger DD externalities necessitate greater reserve ac- cumulation to stabilize future output, thereby mitigating consumption volatility. While transfers directly support private consumption smoothing, public investment also con- tributes to this goal by sustaining future income through gradual capital accumulation. Higher aid volatility calls for increased public investment, underscoring the role of public capital accumulation as a precautionary saving instrument, beyond its developmental role discussed in the literature.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了低收入国家（LICs）中针对波动性援助流的拉姆齐最优政策，涉及财政支出和国际储备积累。通过构建一个真实的小型开放经济体DSGE模型，结合荷兰病外部性和金融约束家庭等特征，研究发现部分储备积累和部分财政支出是最优策略。荷兰病外部性越强，储备积累需求越大，以稳定未来产出和减少消费波动。公共投资通过资本积累支持未来收入，而转移支付直接平滑私人消费。援助波动性越高，公共投资需求越大，凸显其作为预防性储蓄工具的作用。
AI.research_question: 低收入国家如何通过拉姆齐最优政策（财政支出和国际储备积累）应对波动性援助流？
AI.motivation: 低收入国家面临援助流波动性带来的经济挑战，需探索最优政策以稳定经济和消费。
AI.theoretical_framework: 动态随机一般均衡（DSGE）模型，结合荷兰病外部性和金融约束家庭特征。
AI.method: 构建小型开放经济体的真实DSGE模型，分析拉姆齐最优政策。
AI.findings: 部分储备积累和部分财政支出是最优策略；荷兰病外部性越强，储备积累需求越大；公共投资通过资本积累支持未来收入；援助波动性越高，公共投资需求越大。
AI.theory_contributions: 扩展了DSGE模型在低收入国家的应用，强调了荷兰病外部性和金融约束的作用。
AI.practical_contributions: 为政策制定者提供了应对援助波动的具体策略，如储备积累和公共投资分配。

title: Time-Series Evaluation of an Ed-Based Syndromic Alarm System Before and During the Covid-19 Pandemic
affiliations: CHA University - CHA Bundang Medical Center, Korea University Medical Center, National Medical Center, National Medical Center and National Medical Center

detail.title: Time-Series Evaluation of an Ed-Based Syndromic Alarm System Before and During the Covid-19 Pandemic
detail.abstract: Objective: To evaluate the performance and limitations of an emergency department (ED)-based syndromic surveillance (SyS) model for detecting respiratory infection outbreaks in Korea, across distinct age groups and epidemiological contexts before and during the COVID-19 pandemic.Methods: We conducted a retrospective time-series analysis using nationwide data from Level 1 and 2 EDs between 2017 and 2022. Syndromic visits were defined as those with fever (≥38.0 °C) or respiratory symptoms. Age-stratified autoregressive integrated moving average (ARIMA) models were trained on data from 2017–2018 and 2020–2021 to forecast syndromic ED visits in 2019 and 2022, respectively. Alarms were triggered when observed visit counts exceeded both the model’s 95th percentile prediction interval and historical day-of-week thresholds. Alarm performance was assessed against ED discharge diagnoses of respiratory infectious diseases.Results: The system performed well under stable pre-pandemic conditions, particularly among children aged 0–4 years (3-day alarm sensitivity: 1.000; specificity: 0.964), and moderately among adults aged 65 years and older. In contrast, model performance deteriorated in 2022 under pandemic conditions, especially among adults aged 20–64 years, with alarm sensitivity dropping below 0.300. The decline was driven by persistently elevated syndromic activity during the Omicron wave, which overwhelmed the static thresholds of the ARIMA models.Conclusion: ED-based SyS can offer timely and specific early warning for seasonal respiratory outbreaks, particularly in pediatric populations. However, its utility is limited during sustained pandemic waves. Future surveillance systems must incorporate adaptive models, dynamic thresholds, and multiple data streams to remain effective under evolving epidemiological baselines.

AI.tldr: 该研究评估了韩国急诊科（ED）基于症状监测（SyS）模型在COVID-19大流行前后检测呼吸道感染暴发的表现和局限性，发现模型在稳定条件下表现良好，但在大流行期间性能下降。
AI.research_question: 急诊科基于症状监测模型在不同年龄组和流行病学背景下检测呼吸道感染暴发的表现和局限性如何？
AI.motivation: 评估SyS模型在COVID-19大流行前后的实用性，以改进未来的监测系统。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于时间序列分析（ARIMA模型）和症状监测理论。
AI.method: 使用2017-2022年全国急诊科数据，通过ARIMA模型预测并触发警报，评估警报性能。
AI.findings: 模型在稳定条件下表现良好（尤其是儿童），但在大流行期间性能下降（尤其是成人）。
AI.theory_contributions: 揭示了SyS模型在动态流行病学基线下的局限性。
AI.practical_contributions: 建议未来监测系统需采用自适应模型和动态阈值以提高实用性。

title: Impact of Information Externalities and Purchase Costs on Dual-Channel Marketing Strategies in Live-Streaming Sales
affiliations: affiliation not provided to SSRN and School of Management and Economics of University of Electronic Science and Technology of China, Chengdu, China

detail.title: Impact of Information Externalities and Purchase Costs on Dual-Channel Marketing Strategies in Live-Streaming Sales
detail.abstract: In recent years, the rapid development of live-streaming sales has given rise not only to diversified purchasing behaviors but also to the transformation of commerce business modes. However, few studies have investigated the impact of the characteristics of the live-streaming sales channel on multi-channel market operations. This paper addresses this gap by investigating the impact of information externalities and purchase costs in live-streaming sales within a dual-channel market. We develop a theoretical model for a manufacturer operating both traditional offline and live-streaming channels to determine optimal strategies. Considering that consumers may prefer both offline and live-streaming channels makes our research more comprehensive. According to our analysis, under varying consumer channel preferences, an increase in information externalities helps improve the profits of both channels, whereas an increase in purchasing costs would reduce the profits of both channels. Further, we identify conditions for profitable coexistence of dual channels and analyze optimal pricing strategies for the manufacturer and the live-streaming channel. These findings offer valuable insights into how manufacturers can conduct live-streaming sales in a dual-channel environment and also provide theoretical support for understanding the characteristics of live-streaming sales.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了直播销售渠道的信息外部性和购买成本对双渠道市场运营的影响，提出了制造商的优化策略，并分析了双渠道共存的条件。
AI.research_question: 直播销售渠道的信息外部性和购买成本如何影响双渠道市场的运营？
AI.motivation: 近年来直播销售快速发展，但对其在多渠道市场运营中的影响研究较少。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于双渠道市场理论，结合信息外部性和购买成本分析。
AI.method: 构建理论模型，分析制造商在传统线下和直播渠道中的最优策略。
AI.findings: 信息外部性增加可提升双渠道利润，购买成本增加则降低利润；提出了双渠道共存的条件和最优定价策略。
AI.theory_contributions: 为理解直播销售特性提供了理论支持。
AI.practical_contributions: 为制造商在双渠道环境中开展直播销售提供了实践指导。

title: Impact of Humanizing Fintech Applications on Customer-Centered Value: A Qualitative Study on the Banking Sector of the GCC
affiliations: affiliation not provided to SSRN

detail.title: Impact of Humanizing Fintech Applications on Customer-Centered Value: A Qualitative Study on the Banking Sector of the GCC
detail.abstract: This study explores the impact of humanizing FinTech applications on customer-centered value within the banking sector of the Gulf Cooperation Council (GCC). Using a qualitative approach based on Grounded Theory, in-depth interviews were conducted with 120 participants, including clients and employees from Gulf banks. The analysis revealed that integrating human-centered design elements into FinTech platforms significantly enhances dimensions such as personalization, trust, emotional connection, usability, and overall customer satisfaction. Four key themes emerged from the coding process: human responsiveness in digital design, control and trust through technology, the human gap in digital experiences, and the need for a smooth and intuitive digital journey. These themes culminated in a core category that underpins the grounded theory: the interactive integration of technology and humanity in the digital banking experience. The study concludes that true customer-centered value can only be achieved when technological sophistication is combined with emotional intelligence and ethical interaction. The findings offer practical recommendations for banks, including investing in ethical AI, transparent blockchain integration, human-centric design, and inclusive digital services for all customer groups. The study emphasizes that innovation in FinTech must be guided by human values to ensure long-term customer engagement and loyalty.

AI.tldr: 本研究探讨了人性化金融科技应用对海湾合作委员会（GCC）银行业以客户为中心的价值的影响，发现技术与人性结合能显著提升客户满意度。
AI.research_question: 人性化金融科技应用如何影响海湾合作委员会（GCC）银行业以客户为中心的价值？
AI.motivation: 探索技术与人性结合在金融科技中的重要性，以提升客户体验和忠诚度。
AI.theoretical_framework: 扎根理论（Grounded Theory）。
AI.method: 基于扎根理论的定性研究，对120名海湾银行客户和员工进行深度访谈。
AI.findings: 人性化设计显著提升个性化、信任、情感连接、易用性和客户满意度；四大主题：数字设计中的人性响应、技术带来的控制与信任、数字体验中的人性缺失、流畅直观的数字旅程。
AI.theory_contributions: 提出技术与人性交互整合的核心理论，强调情感智能和伦理互动的重要性。
AI.practical_contributions: 建议银行投资伦理AI、透明区块链、人性化设计和包容性数字服务，以提升长期客户忠诚度。

title: A Unified Intelligence-Augmented Framework for Building Audits Via Physical and Virtual Inspection
affiliations: Lund University, ETH Zürich and affiliation not provided to SSRN

detail.title: A Unified Intelligence-Augmented Framework for Building Audits Via Physical and Virtual Inspection
detail.abstract: Building audits are essential for informed maintenance, renovation, and end-of-life planning decisions. However, current practices remain largely manual, time-consuming, and difficult to scale due to fragmented data that hinder circular construction. This paper introduces a unified, intelligence-augmented framework to improve the efficiency and reliability of physical and virtual building inspections. Five core design principles of adaptability, accessibility, affordability, acceleration, and alignment are derived from a multiphased formal analysis to guide the development of the R²PIVS pipeline in six modules: retrieval, reality capture, prediction, interaction, visualization, and summarization. The pipeline leverages human-AI collaboration for building inventory tasks, such as geometry measurement, visual inspection, and hazard inference. The framework supports mixed-initiative workflows through interactive annotation, model refinement, and prediction validation. By aligning machine learning capabilities with domain requirements, this research establishes a foundation for designing and implementing a scalable, human-in-the-loop building audit system that enable standardized, data-rich assessments and collaborative decision-making for circular construction throughout the building life cycle.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种基于人工智能的统一框架R²PIVS，通过六个模块（检索、现实捕捉、预测、交互、可视化和总结）提升建筑审计的效率和可靠性，支持人机协作以实现标准化和可扩展的建筑生命周期评估。
AI.research_question: 如何通过人工智能和人机协作提升建筑审计的效率和可靠性，以支持循环建筑的标准化评估？
AI.motivation: 当前建筑审计实践依赖手工操作，数据分散且难以扩展，阻碍了循环建筑的发展。
AI.theoretical_framework: 适应性、可访问性、经济性、加速性和对齐性五个核心设计原则。
AI.method: 多阶段形式化分析，开发R²PIVS框架的六个模块，结合人机协作完成建筑库存任务。
AI.findings: R²PIVS框架能够提升建筑审计的效率和可靠性，支持标准化和协作决策。
AI.theory_contributions: 提出了基于人工智能的建筑审计框架，明确了人机协作的设计原则。
AI.practical_contributions: 为建筑生命周期评估提供了可扩展的解决方案，支持循环建筑的实现。

title: Research on Digital Transformation and Enhancement of Corporate Value: Evidence from Chinese Listed Companies
affiliations: affiliation not provided to SSRN, affiliation not provided to SSRN and affiliation not provided to SSRN

detail.title: Research on Digital Transformation and Enhancement of Corporate Value: Evidence from Chinese Listed Companies
detail.abstract: This study explores how digital transformation (DT) impacts firm value using data from Chinese A-share manufacturers (2007–2022). Key findings reveal: (1) A U-shaped relationship—DT initially lowers firm value due to rising costs and efficiency declines but eventually boosts value as digital maturity optimizes operations (robust to endogeneity checks). (2) Mechanism: Early-stage DT increases costs, reducing efficiency, while sustained investment improves operations, turning DT into a value driver. (3) Heterogeneity: The U-curve is stronger in state-owned enterprises, high-tech firms, and high-marketization regions (e.g., eastern China). Results highlight DT’s dual-phase effect—short-term costs precede long-term gains—offering insights for firms navigating industrial digitization, especially in strategic sectors.

AI.tldr: 研究探讨数字化转型（DT）如何影响企业价值，基于中国A股制造业数据（2007-2022）。发现U型关系：初期DT因成本上升和效率下降降低企业价值，但随着数字化成熟优化运营，最终提升价值。机制分析显示早期DT增加成本，持续投资则改善运营。异质性分析表明U型曲线在国企、高科技企业及市场化程度高的地区更显著。
AI.research_question: 数字化转型如何影响企业价值？
AI.motivation: 探讨数字化转型对企业价值的动态影响，揭示其短期成本与长期收益的双重效应。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于数字化转型与企业价值关系的理论，分析其U型曲线效应及异质性。
AI.method: 使用中国A股制造业数据（2007-2022），结合内生性检验和机制分析。
AI.findings: DT与企业价值呈U型关系，初期降低价值，后期提升价值；机制为早期成本增加与后期运营优化；异质性体现在国企、高科技企业及高市场化地区。
AI.theory_contributions: 揭示了数字化转型对企业价值的动态影响机制，丰富了相关理论。
AI.practical_contributions: 为企业制定数字化转型策略提供参考，强调长期投资的重要性，尤其对国企和高科技企业。

title: User-Centric Voice Cloning Platform for Scalable Audiobook Narration
affiliations: Rashtreeya Vidyalaya College of Engineering (RVCE) and RVCE, Bangalore

detail.title: User-Centric Voice Cloning Platform for Scalable Audiobook Narration
detail.abstract: Personalized speech synthesis has emerged as a transformative technology in the field of human-computer interaction, especially in applications such as audiobook narration. This paper presents a deep learning-based voice cloning system designed to generate expressive, speaker specific audiobook narrations using neural text-to-speech (TTS) techniques. The proposed system employs XTTS v2 for high-fidelity, multilingual speech synthesis and incorporates a pre-trained speaker encoder to extract voice characteristics from short user-provided audio samples. The entire pipeline operates offline, enabling private, real-time inference in environments with limited or no internet connectivity. Given a text input, the system produces audio output that closely mimics the target speaker's voice characteristics. To enhance clarity and user control, the system allows parameter adjustments such as speech speed, pitch, and expressiveness. A Streamlit-based graphical interface facilitates user interaction, supporting voice sample uploads, text input, real-time playback, waveform visualization, and audio downloads. The modular and scalable architecture is designed to support multiple voice presets, with future extensibility toward emotional tone modulation and multispeaker synthesis. Experimental evaluations demonstrate that the system consistently generates natural, intelligible, and personalized speech, as verified through subjective listening tests and waveform analyses. The results confirm the viability of secure, offline voice cloning for personalized audiobook generation. Future work will focus on improving speakers, embedding fidelity, emotional control, and expanding deployment to mobile and edge platforms, further advancing accessibility and user engagement in voice-driven applications.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种基于深度学习的语音克隆系统，用于生成个性化的有声书叙述，支持离线操作和多语言合成。
AI.research_question: 如何利用深度学习技术实现高保真、个性化的语音克隆，以支持离线环境下的有声书生成？
AI.motivation: 个性化语音合成在人机交互领域具有重要应用价值，尤其是在有声书叙述中，但目前的技术在离线环境和用户控制方面存在局限。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于神经文本到语音（TTS）技术和预训练说话人编码器，实现语音特征提取和合成。
AI.method: 采用XTTS v2进行多语言语音合成，结合说话人编码器提取用户音频样本特征，通过离线管道生成个性化语音。
AI.findings: 系统能够生成自然、清晰的个性化语音，并通过主观听力测试和波形分析验证了其有效性。
AI.theory_contributions: 提出了一种离线语音克隆的模块化架构，支持多语言和用户参数调整。
AI.practical_contributions: 为有声书生成提供了一种安全、离线的解决方案，增强了用户控制和交互体验。

title: Knowledge Graph Contrastive Learning for Recommendation Via Knowledge-Aware Reasoning
affiliations: Yangzhou University, Yangzhou University and Yangzhou University

detail.title: Knowledge Graph Contrastive Learning for Recommendation Via Knowledge-Aware Reasoning
detail.abstract: Knowledge Graph (KG) has attracted increasing attention in the recommendation domain due to its potential in enriching semantic representations. Although existing methods can effectively alleviate data sparsity and cold-start problems by introducing rich auxiliary knowledge, it is still susceptible to interference caused by redundant relations and semantic discrepancies, which prevents the model from effectively focusing on explicit relation-aware principles. In this paper, we propose a novel self-supervised recommendation method Knowledge Graph Contrastive Learning for Recommendation via Knowledge-Aware Reasoning, called KGCR. Firstly, we perform relation modeling by leveraging relation-aware scores of knowledge triples to infer critical information within local neighborhoods. Then, this information is extended to user-item relationships to learn more valuable latent information. Finally, we introduce cross-view contrastive learning to further exploit graph structural information. Specifically, we consider the User-item Interaction Graph (UIG) as the collaborative view and the knowledge graph as the semantic view, optimizing the rationality enhancement mechanism for both views based on perception scores. Extensive experimental results demonstrate that KGCR outperforms state-of-the-art baseline models across three public datasets. The code of KGCR is available at https://github.com/agionyy/KGCR.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种基于知识图谱对比学习的自监督推荐方法KGCR，通过关系建模和跨视图对比学习，解决了冗余关系和语义差异的干扰问题，显著提升了推荐性能。
AI.research_question: 如何通过知识图谱对比学习解决推荐系统中冗余关系和语义差异的干扰问题？
AI.motivation: 现有方法虽然能缓解数据稀疏和冷启动问题，但仍受冗余关系和语义差异的干扰，无法有效聚焦显式关系感知原则。
AI.theoretical_framework: 知识图谱、关系建模、对比学习、用户-物品交互图（UIG）。
AI.method: 1. 利用知识三元组的关系感知分数进行关系建模；2. 将信息扩展到用户-物品关系；3. 引入跨视图对比学习优化视图增强机制。
AI.findings: KGCR在三个公开数据集上优于现有基线模型。
AI.theory_contributions: 提出了一种结合知识图谱和对比学习的自监督推荐框架，丰富了推荐系统的理论方法。
AI.practical_contributions: 通过KGCR方法显著提升了推荐性能，代码已开源。

detail.title: Breaking Parity

publicationDetails.journalName: International Monetary Fund (IMF) Research Paper Series

detail.abstract: We offer a unifying empirical model of covered and uncovered currency premia, interest rates and spot and forward exchange rates, both in the cross section and time series of currencies. We find that the rich empirical patterns are in line with a partial equilibrium model of the currency market, where hedged and unhedged currency is supplied by intermediary banks subject to value-at-risk balance-sheet constraints, emphasizing the frictional nature of equilibrium currency premia and exchange rate dynamics. In the cross section, the excess supply of local-currency savings is the key determinant of low relative interest rates, negative covered and uncovered currency premia, cheap forward dollars; and vice versa. In the time series, covered currency premia change infrequently and in concert across currencies, driven by aggregate financial market conditions. In contrast, uncovered currency premia move frequently in response to currency-specific demand shocks, which we capture with the dynamics of net currency futures positions of dealer banks. Sharp exchange rate depreciations in response to negative shifts in currency demand are followed by small persistent predictable appreciations that generate future positive expected currency returns necessary to ensure intermediation of currency demand shocks, irrespective of their financial or macroeconomic origin. Changes in net futures positions of dealer banks account for most of the variation in the spot exchange rate for every currency.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种统一的实证模型，研究货币溢价、利率以及即期和远期汇率的跨货币和时间序列模式，发现这些模式与银行中介在风险约束下的部分均衡模型一致。
AI.research_question: 如何统一解释货币溢价、利率及汇率的跨货币和时间序列模式？
AI.motivation: 现有研究未能统一解释货币溢价和汇率的复杂模式，本文试图填补这一空白。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于银行中介的部分均衡模型，强调风险约束对货币溢价和汇率动态的影响。
AI.method: 实证分析跨货币和时间序列数据，结合银行中介的风险约束模型。
AI.findings: 跨货币中，本地储蓄的过剩供给决定低利率和负货币溢价；时间序列中，货币溢价受金融市场条件和需求冲击影响。
AI.theory_contributions: 提出了统一的货币市场模型，强调银行中介的风险约束作用。
AI.practical_contributions: 为理解汇率动态和货币溢价提供了新视角，对金融市场参与者有指导意义。

title: Quantum Resistant Software Defined-Networking Ipsec, Enabling its Communication Over Ip Networks on Real Telco Infrastructures
affiliations: Universidad Politecnica de Madrid, Universidad Politecnica de Madrid, Universidad Politecnica de Madrid, affiliation not provided to SSRN, affiliation not provided to SSRN and Universidad Politecnica de Madrid

detail.title: Quantum Resistant Software Defined-Networking Ipsec, Enabling its Communication Over Ip Networks on Real Telco Infrastructures
detail.abstract: The growing dependence on digital communications underscores the need to protect data as it travels through the network. Internet Protocol Security (IPsec) plays a central role, providing a robust framework to ensure the confidentiality, integrity, and authenticity of transmitted data. However, advances in Quantum Computing pose a significant threat to current public-key cryptographic schemes by enabling efficient solutions to factoring and discrete logarithm problems. A promising solution also arises from the quantum domain. Quantum Key Distribution (QKD) provides a security layer immune to any computational attacks, whether quantum or classical. While the rapid adoption of quantum-safe technologies is highly desirable, it is equally important to ensure the resilience of existing trusted infrastructures, as the introduction of novel technologies may also entail unforeseen challenges. Enabling an evolutionary path that brings our current security infrastructure to a quantum-safe one, protected against both present and future threats, is thus very important. This work proposes a solution that integrates emerging quantum technologies into the existing security and communications infrastructure to ensure long-term protection. We focus on IPsec —one of the most widely deployed security protocols— and combine it with Software-Defined Networking (SDN) and QKD to construct a novel network security infrastructure that is resilient against both classical and quantum computational threats. Building upon recent standardization initiatives and operational tools for QKD integration, we demonstrate advanced capabilities -including rekeying and secure key transport- on a field deployed QKD network operating within a shared quantum-classical production infrastructure.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种将量子密钥分发（QKD）与现有IPsec和软件定义网络（SDN）结合的新型网络安全基础设施，以抵御经典和量子计算威胁。
AI.research_question: 如何将新兴量子技术整合到现有安全和通信基础设施中，以确保长期保护？
AI.motivation: 量子计算对当前公钥密码方案构成威胁，需要开发量子安全的解决方案，同时确保现有基础设施的韧性。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于量子密钥分发（QKD）和IPsec的理论框架，结合软件定义网络（SDN）。
AI.method: 提出了一种结合QKD、IPsec和SDN的新型网络安全基础设施，并在实际部署的QKD网络中验证了其功能。
AI.findings: 成功构建了一种能够抵御经典和量子计算威胁的网络基础设施，并展示了其高级功能（如密钥更新和安全密钥传输）。
AI.theory_contributions: 提出了将量子技术与现有安全协议结合的创新理论框架。
AI.practical_contributions: 为实际网络基础设施提供了一种量子安全的解决方案，支持长期保护。

title: Assessing Young Professionals' Awareness and Perceptions of AI-Powered Personalized Product Recommendations and Data Privacy Concerns on Online Shopping Platforms
affiliations: Green Valley College - Green Valley College Foundation Inc., Green Valley College - Green Valley College Foundation Inc., Green Valley College - Green Valley College Foundation Inc., Green Valley College - Green Valley College Foundation Inc. and Green Valley College - Green Valley College Foundation Inc.

detail.title: Assessing Young Professionals' Awareness and Perceptions of AI-Powered Personalized Product Recommendations and Data Privacy Concerns on Online Shopping Platforms
detail.abstract:
The rapid expansion of e-commerce has accelerated the integration of artificial intelligence (AI) in delivering personalized product recommendations, significantly enhancing user experience and engagement. However, alongside these advancements come persistent concerns surrounding data privacy, transparency, and user autonomy. This study aimed to examine the awareness, perceptions, and data privacy concerns of young professionals in Koronadal City regarding AI-powered personalized recommendations, and to determine whether data privacy concerns mediate the relationship between awareness and perception. Using a descriptive-correlational research design, data were collected through a validated, researcher-made questionnaire distributed via convenience sampling. Descriptive statistics (frequency distribution, weighted mean, and standard deviation) and inferential tools including Pearson correlation and Hayes’ PROCESS macro (Model 4) were employed for analysis.

Findings revealed that while respondents acknowledged the benefits of AI-driven personalization, concerns about potential data misuse and lack of transparency in data handling remained prominent. A very strong positive correlation (r = 0.935, p < 0.01) was found between awareness and perception, indicating that higher awareness is associated with more favorable views of AI applications. Further mediation analysis confirmed that data privacy concerns partially mediate this relationship, suggesting that while awareness directly improves perception, part of this influence is filtered through heightened sensitivity to privacy risks.

These results underscore the need for ethical AI practices, increased algorithmic transparency, and greater user control over personalization and data use. Building trust in AI-powered e-commerce systems requires not only raising awareness but also addressing privacy concerns through responsible, consumer-centered design and regulation.

AI.tldr: 该研究探讨了年轻专业人士对AI个性化推荐的认知、感知及数据隐私担忧，发现隐私担忧部分中介了认知与感知的关系，强调了伦理AI实践和透明度的重要性。
AI.research_question: 年轻专业人士对AI驱动的个性化推荐的认知、感知及数据隐私担忧如何相关？数据隐私担忧是否中介了认知与感知的关系？
AI.motivation: 随着AI在电商中的广泛应用，用户对数据隐私和透明度的担忧日益突出，研究旨在揭示这些担忧如何影响用户对AI的感知。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于数据隐私理论和用户感知理论，研究探讨了隐私担忧在认知与感知关系中的中介作用。
AI.method: 采用描述性-相关性研究设计，通过问卷调查收集数据，使用描述性统计和Hayes’ PROCESS宏进行分析。
AI.findings: 认知与感知呈强正相关（r=0.935），隐私担忧部分中介了这一关系。
AI.theory_contributions: 验证了隐私担忧在认知与感知关系中的中介作用，丰富了数据隐私理论。
AI.practical_contributions: 建议通过伦理实践和透明度提升用户信任，为AI电商系统设计提供指导。

detail.abstract: Purpose. Our main objective is to address an apparent need concerning small business cybersecurity. We propose a practical framework aimed at enhancing small business cybersecurity readiness augmented with affordable tools. Enhancing small businesses cybersecurity is imperative given the role they play as a driving force for growth, investment and innovation and for ensuring stability in labor force markets and the economy. Their adoption of various digital technologies during the pandemic has softened its severe effects and ensured continuous activity. Yet, it also exposed small business to cyber related risks. Given their limited resources and nimble operations, many forgo installing more comprehensive cybersecurity systems. Our paper seeks to address this apparent gap and shortcoming. Design/Methodology. Accessing a large collection of extant works on cybersecurity and employing a strict search criteria that are most relevant to subject matter, we located 50 studies on business related cybersecurity of which only 10 have dealt with small business per se. We used thematic analysis to establish evidence-based themes derived from these studies' findings in support of a possible practical cybersecurity readiness model and recommendations. Findings. Three evidence-based themes emerged-Strong organizational culture, proactive technology adoption and active risk management strategy. These three pillars are the foundation upon which a sound cybersecurity readiness framework rests. These very pillars also serve as the building blocks of our proposed model that seeks to enhance organizational resilience against evolving cyber threats. Originality/Value. Borrowing from the extant literature and anchored in tenets of our theoretical framework-the risk homeostasis theory and the technology-organization-environment (TOE), our paper adds some rigor to the existing paucity of works on small business and cybersecurity. The proposed model addresses specific and timely needs designed to strengthen small business readiness for effectively guarding against potential cyber risks. We further discuss related practical implications and offer concrete actionable roadmap and recommendations tailored to resource limited small businesses.

AI.tldr: 本文旨在解决小型企业在网络安全方面的需求，提出一个实用的框架，结合经济实惠的工具提升其网络安全准备。研究发现三个关键主题：强大的组织文化、主动的技术采用和积极的风险管理策略，并基于此提出模型。
AI.research_question: 如何提升小型企业的网络安全准备？
AI.motivation: 小型企业在经济增长和创新中扮演重要角色，但其有限的资源导致网络安全防护不足，亟需解决方案。
AI.theoretical_framework: 风险平衡理论和技术-组织-环境（TOE）框架。
AI.method: 通过文献综述和主题分析，筛选50项相关研究（其中10项专注于小型企业），提取关键主题。
AI.findings: 三个关键主题：强大的组织文化、主动的技术采用和积极的风险管理策略。
AI.theory_contributions: 结合风险平衡理论和TOE框架，填补小型企业网络安全研究的空白。
AI.practical_contributions: 提出针对资源有限的小型企业的具体行动建议和实用框架。

detail.title: Vertical Integration and Consumer Choice: Evidence from a Field Experiment

declarations.declarationOfInterest: Starting August 11, 2025, Fradkin will be an employee at Amazon.com. The research and analysis in this paper were conceived and completed prior to this appointment, and a draft was first submitted as an NBER Working Paper on August 5, 2025.
declarations.funderStatement: Boston University and Harvard Business School

detail.abstract: Platforms, retailers, and other firms often offer their own products alongside products sold by competitors. We study the effects of this practice by combining a field experiment that hides brands owned by Amazon (i.e., private labels) from shoppers on Amazon.com with model-based counterfactuals and welfare analysis. In the absence of private labels, consumers substitute toward products that are similar along most observable dimensions. Removing Amazon brands does not change consumers' search effort or their propensity to shop at other retail websites. Despite the ample availability of observably similar alternatives, our welfare estimates imply that, for the categories we study, removing Amazon brands would reduce consumer surplus by 5.5 percent in the short run, with approximately 10 percent of the impact due to equilibrium price increases by other sellers. The effects are heterogeneous, with consumer surplus reductions exceeding 10 percent in some categories, while other categories realize much smaller decreases when Amazon brands are removed. Demoting private labels in search results to counteract potential self-preferencing does not lead to gains in consumer surplus. This outcome arises because a subset of consumers derive greater utility from private labels and benefit from their high placement in search results.

AI.tldr: 研究通过实验和模型分析亚马逊自有品牌对消费者福利的影响，发现移除自有品牌会降低消费者剩余，且不同品类影响差异显著。
AI.research_question: 亚马逊自有品牌对消费者行为和福利的影响是什么？
AI.motivation: 探讨平台自有品牌与竞争品牌共存对消费者选择和福利的实际影响。
AI.theoretical_framework: 消费者选择理论、福利经济学、市场竞争理论。
AI.method: 结合亚马逊网站的现场实验、模型反事实分析和福利评估。
AI.findings: 移除自有品牌导致消费者剩余减少5.5%，部分品类影响更大；消费者搜索行为和购物倾向未显著改变。
AI.theory_contributions: 揭示了自有品牌对消费者福利的异质性影响，补充了平台竞争理论。
AI.practical_contributions: 为平台和零售商提供了自有品牌策略的实证依据，建议谨慎调整搜索排名策略。

title: Selling Information for Bilateral Trade
affiliations: University of Bristol and University of Cambridge

detail.title: Selling Information for Bilateral Trade
detail.abstract: We study the design and pricing of information by independent information providers for a buyer engaged in a trading relationship with a seller, and examine their welfare implications. While competitive information firms would sell full information about the value of the good, a monopolist supplies limited information in a particularly simple form-often resulting in higher total surplus than under full information, by influencing the seller's pricing decision. If only a single information structure can be offered, it takes a binary threshold form. If the provider can offer a menu of priced information structures before the seller sets a price, he offers a continuum of thresholds, inducing a unit-elastic demand function for the seller. In both scenarios, the information firm increases total welfare when the seller's cost is high but reduces it when the cost is low.

AI.tldr: 研究独立信息提供商为与卖方交易的买方设计和定价信息的策略及其福利影响。竞争性信息公司会提供完整信息，而垄断者提供有限信息，可能通过影响卖方定价提高总剩余。单一信息结构为二元阈值形式；若提供菜单，则诱导卖方单位弹性需求函数。信息公司在卖方成本高时增加福利，成本低时减少福利。
AI.research_question: 独立信息提供商如何设计和定价信息以影响买方与卖方的交易关系及其福利影响？
AI.motivation: 探讨信息提供商在交易关系中的作用及其对市场效率的影响。
AI.theoretical_framework: 信息设计理论、垄断与竞争市场理论、福利经济学。
AI.method: 理论模型分析，比较竞争性和垄断性信息提供商的行为及其对总剩余的影响。
AI.findings: 竞争性信息公司提供完整信息，垄断者提供有限信息；单一信息结构为二元阈值，菜单诱导单位弹性需求；信息公司在高成本时增加福利，低成本时减少福利。
AI.theory_contributions: 扩展了信息设计理论，揭示了垄断信息提供商的行为及其对市场效率的双重影响。
AI.practical_contributions: 为政策制定者和市场参与者提供了关于信息提供商行为及其福利影响的洞见。

detail.title: How Deep Is Representational Bias in LLMs? The Cases of Caste and Religion

publicationDetails.detailsText: Paper has been accepted for publication at The Eighth AAAI/ACM Conference on AI, Ethics, and Society (AIES 2025)

detail.abstract: Representational bias in large language models (LLMs) has predominantly been measured through single-response interactions and has focused on Global North-centric identities like race and gender. We expand on that research by conducting a systematic audit of GPT-4 Turbo to reveal how deeply encoded representational biases are and how they extend to less-explored dimensions of identity. We prompt GPT-4 Turbo to generate over 7,200 stories about significant life events (such as weddings) in India, using prompts designed to encourage diversity to varying extents. Comparing the diversity of religious and caste representation in the outputs against the actual population distribution in India as recorded in census data, we quantify the presence and "stickiness" of representational bias in the LLM for religion and caste. We find that GPT-4 responses consistently overrepresent culturally dominant groups far beyond their statistical representation, despite prompts intended to encourage representational diversity. Our findings also suggest that representational bias in LLMs has a winner-takes-all quality that is more biased than the likely distribution bias in their training data, and repeated prompt-based nudges have limited and inconsistent efficacy in dislodging these biases. These results suggest that diversifying training data alone may not be sufficient to correct LLM bias, highlighting the need for more fundamental changes in model development. Dataset

AI.tldr: 本文通过系统审计GPT-4 Turbo，揭示了大型语言模型（LLMs）中编码的表征偏见，尤其是在印度宗教和种姓维度上的偏见。研究发现，尽管提示鼓励多样性，但模型仍过度代表文化主导群体，且这种偏见具有“赢家通吃”特性。
AI.research_question: 大型语言模型（如GPT-4 Turbo）在表征多样性方面的偏见有多深？这些偏见如何扩展到未被充分探索的身份维度（如宗教和种姓）？
AI.motivation: 现有研究多关注单一交互和全球北方身份（如种族和性别），而忽视了其他维度的偏见。本文旨在填补这一空白。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于表征偏见和语言模型训练的理论框架。
AI.method: 通过生成7,200个关于印度重要生活事件（如婚礼）的故事，比较模型输出与印度人口普查数据中的宗教和种姓分布。
AI.findings: GPT-4 Turbo的输出过度代表文化主导群体，且提示多样性对纠正偏见的效果有限。
AI.theory_contributions: 揭示了LLM表征偏见的“赢家通吃”特性，表明仅多样化训练数据不足以纠正偏见。
AI.practical_contributions: 为模型开发者提供了改进LLM多样性的建议，强调了模型开发中更根本性变革的必要性。

title: Knowing (not) to know: XAI and human metacognition
affiliations: Goethe University Frankfurt, Leibniz Institute for Financial Research SAFE, affiliation not provided to SSRN, Goethe University Frankfurt - Faculty of Economics and Business Administration and Goethe University Frankfurt

detail.title: Knowing (not) to know: XAI and human metacognition
detail.abstract: The use of explainable AI (XAI) methods to render the prediction logic of black-box AI interpretable to humans is becoming more popular and more widely used in practice, among other things due to regulatory requirements such as the EU AI Act. Previous research on human-XAI interaction has shown that explainability may help mitigate black-box problems but also unintentionally alter individuals' cognitive processes, e.g., distorting their reasoning and evoking informational overload. While empirical evidence on the impact of XAI on how individuals "think" is growing, it has been largely overlooked whether XAI can even affect individuals' "thinking about thinking", i.e., metacognition, which theory conceptualizes to monitor and control previously-studied thinking processes. Aiming to take a first step in filling this gap, we investigate whether XAI affects confidence calibrations, and, thereby, decisions to transfer decision-making responsibility to AI, on the meta-level of cognition. We conduct two incentivized experiments in which human experts repeatedly perform prediction tasks, with the option to delegate each task to an AI. We exogenously vary whether participants initially receive explanations that reveal the AI's underlying prediction logic. We find that XAI improves individuals' metaknowledge (the alignment between confidence and actual performance) and partially enhances confidence sensitivity (the variation of confidence with task performance). These metacognitive shifts causally increase both the frequency and effectiveness of human-to-AI delegation decisions. Interestingly, these effects only occur when explanations reveal to individuals that AI's logic diverges from their own, leading to a systematic reduction in confidence. Our findings suggest that XAI can correct overconfidence at the potential cost of lowering confidence even when individuals perform well. Both effects influence decisions to cede responsibility to AI, highlighting metacognition as a central mechanism in human-XAI collaboration.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了可解释AI（XAI）对个体元认知（如信心校准）的影响，发现XAI能改善元知识并部分增强信心敏感性，从而增加人类向AI委派决策的频率和效果。这些效应仅在XAI揭示AI逻辑与个体逻辑不同时发生。
AI.research_question: XAI是否会影响个体的元认知（如信心校准），进而影响人类向AI委派决策的行为？
AI.motivation: 尽管XAI在解决黑盒问题上有潜力，但其对个体认知过程的影响尚未完全明确，尤其是对元认知的影响未被充分研究。
AI.theoretical_framework: 元认知理论（监控和控制认知过程）和XAI相关理论。
AI.method: 两个激励性实验，人类专家在预测任务中可选择委派给AI，实验组接收XAI解释，对照组不接收。
AI.findings: XAI改善元知识和部分信心敏感性，增加委派决策的频率和效果，但仅当XAI揭示AI逻辑与个体逻辑不同时。
AI.theory_contributions: 首次将XAI与元认知联系起来，揭示了XAI通过元认知机制影响人类决策行为的路径。
AI.practical_contributions: 为设计更有效的XAI系统提供了理论依据，强调在人类-AI协作中需关注元认知的作用。

title: From Over-Reliance to Smart Integration: Using Large-Language Models as Translators between Specialized Modeling and Simulation Tools
affiliations: Old Dominion University, University at Buffalo, McMaster University and The MITRE Corporation

detail.title: From Over-Reliance to Smart Integration: Using Large-Language Models as Translators between Specialized Modeling and Simulation Tools
detail.abstract: Large Language Models (LLMs) offer transformative potential for Modeling & Simulation (M&S) through natural language interfaces that simplify workflows. However, over-reliance risks compromising quality due to ambiguities, logical shortcuts, and hallucinations. This paper advocates integrating LLMs as middleware or translators between specialized tools to mitigate complexity in M&S tasks. Acting as translators, LLMs can enhance interoperability across multi-formalism, multi-semantics, and multi-paradigm systems. We address two key challenges: identifying appropriate languages and tools for modeling and simulation tasks, and developing efficient software architectures that integrate LLMs without performance bottlenecks. To this end, the paper explores LLM-mediated workflows, emphasizes structured tool integration, and recommends Low-Rank Adaptation-based architectures for efficient task-specific adaptations. This approach ensures LLMs complement rather than replace specialized tools, fostering high-quality, reliable M&S processes.

AI.tldr: 本文探讨了大型语言模型（LLMs）在建模与仿真（M&S）中的潜力，提出将其作为中间件或翻译器以简化工作流程，同时避免过度依赖导致的质量问题。
AI.research_question: 如何有效集成LLMs作为中间件或翻译器，以优化建模与仿真任务的工作流程？
AI.motivation: LLMs通过自然语言界面简化M&S工作流程，但过度依赖可能导致质量下降，需探索其合理集成方式。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于多形式、多语义和多范式系统的互操作性理论，探讨LLMs在M&S中的翻译功能。
AI.method: 提出LLM介导的工作流程，强调结构化工具集成，并推荐基于低秩适配的高效架构。
AI.findings: LLMs作为中间件可提升M&S任务的互操作性，同时避免性能瓶颈。
AI.theory_contributions: 为LLMs在M&S中的应用提供了理论框架，强调其作为翻译器的角色。
AI.practical_contributions: 提出具体技术方案（如低秩适配架构），确保LLMs与专业工具互补，提升M&S质量。

title: Trustworthy Distributed Mirror Learning for Secure and Private Multi-Agent Coordination
affiliations: affiliation not provided to SSRN, affiliation not provided to SSRN, affiliation not provided to SSRN and East China University of Science and Technology (ECUST)

detail.title: Trustworthy Distributed Mirror Learning for Secure and Private Multi-Agent Coordination
detail.abstract: The practical deployment of Multi-Agent Reinforcement Learning (MARL) in Internet of Things systems faces a critical trilemma among convergence, verifiability, and privacy. While Multi-Agent Trust Region Learning (MATRL) ensures Nash equilibrium convergence, it risks data exposure and malicious attacks. To address this, we propose Trustworthy Distributed Mirror Learning (TDML), the first method to unify convergence, verifiability, and privacy in MARL. TDML theoretically breaks MATRL’s centralized architecture into agent-local learning and inter-agent communication. This allows key data to be secured with advanced techniques without compromising the theoretical properties of trust-region learning. Specifically, TDML introduces three core innovations: 1) an information functional that unifies all communication behaviors in distributed MATRL and enables flexible integration of security mechanisms; 2) split advantage computation, which decouples raw inputs from global advantages via intermediate representations to protect local data privacy; and 3) a security scheme that ensures verifiable message exchange by attaching zero-knowledge proofs to inter-agent communications. We prove TDML converges to a Nash equilibrium while providing verifiability and privacy guarantees. More importantly, it constructs a mirror space for trustworthy MARL, where derivative algorithms inherit these theoretical guarantees. Experiments show TDML outperforms state-of-the-art methods in convergence, robustness, and privacy. Its practical value is further validated through a warehouse robot picking task, showing strong resilience against malicious attacks.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种名为TDML的新方法，解决了多智能体强化学习在物联网系统中的收敛性、可验证性和隐私性之间的三难问题。TDML通过分布式架构和安全机制，实现了理论上的均衡收敛，同时保护数据隐私和通信安全。
AI.research_question: 如何在多智能体强化学习中同时实现收敛性、可验证性和隐私性？
AI.motivation: 多智能体信任区域学习（MATRL）虽然能保证纳什均衡收敛，但存在数据暴露和恶意攻击的风险，因此需要一种更安全可靠的方法。
AI.theoretical_framework: 本文基于多智能体强化学习和信任区域学习的理论框架，提出了分布式镜像学习（TDML）的概念。
AI.method: TDML通过以下三个核心创新实现目标：1）统一通信行为的信息功能；2）分离优势计算以保护隐私；3）零知识证明确保通信可验证。
AI.findings: 实验证明TDML在收敛性、鲁棒性和隐私性上优于现有方法，并在仓库机器人任务中表现出抗攻击能力。
AI.theory_contributions: TDML首次统一了收敛性、可验证性和隐私性，并构建了可信赖的多智能体强化学习镜像空间。
AI.practical_contributions: TDML的实际价值通过仓库机器人任务验证，展示了其在现实场景中的抗攻击能力和实用性。

title: Chatbots Evolve: Exploring Functional and Social Drivers of Llm-Chatbots Acceptance in E-Commerce
affiliations: University of Urbino and University of Urbino

detail.title: Chatbots Evolve: Exploring Functional and Social Drivers of Llm-Chatbots Acceptance in E-Commerce
detail.abstract: This study investigates the acceptance of Large Language Model (LLM)-powered chatbots in e-commerce by integrating the Technology Acceptance Model (TAM) with constructs from the Computers Are Social Actors (CASA) paradigm, namely perceived anthropomorphism and intelligence. Based on survey data from 512 respondents, analyzed through PLS-SEM and fuzzy clustering, the study reveals that anthropomorphism and intelligence significantly influence users’ perceptions of usefulness and ease-of-use, which in turn shape attitudes and behavioural intentions. Notably, familiarity with generative AI (e.g., ChatGPT) emerged as a key driver of positive evaluations, while age explained substantial differences across user segments. By integrating functional and social-cognitive determinants, this study advances understanding of LLM-based chatbot adoption and provides e-commerce firms with strategic insights to design user-centered conversational agents that enhance engagement and ultimately drive conversion and customer loyalty.

AI.tldr: 本研究通过整合技术接受模型（TAM）和计算机是社会行动者（CASA）范式中的感知拟人化和智能，探讨了电子商务中大型语言模型（LLM）驱动的聊天机器人的接受度。基于512名受访者的调查数据，通过PLS-SEM和模糊聚类分析，研究发现拟人化和智能显著影响用户对有用性和易用性的感知，进而塑造态度和行为意图。值得注意的是，对生成式AI（如ChatGPT）的熟悉度是积极评价的关键驱动因素，而年龄则解释了用户群体间的显著差异。通过整合功能性和社会认知性决定因素，本研究深化了对基于LLM的聊天机器人采纳的理解，并为电子商务企业提供了设计以用户为中心的对话代理的战略见解，以增强参与度并最终推动转化和客户忠诚度。
AI.research_question: 电子商务中大型语言模型（LLM）驱动的聊天机器人的接受度是如何被拟人化和智能感知影响的？
AI.motivation: 探讨LLM聊天机器人在电子商务中的接受度，以帮助企业设计更有效的对话代理。
AI.theoretical_framework: 技术接受模型（TAM）和计算机是社会行动者（CASA）范式。
AI.method: 基于512名受访者的调查数据，采用PLS-SEM和模糊聚类分析。
AI.findings: 拟人化和智能显著影响用户对有用性和易用性的感知，进而影响态度和行为意图；熟悉生成式AI和年龄是关键驱动因素。
AI.theory_contributions: 整合功能性和社会认知性决定因素，深化了对LLM聊天机器人采纳的理解。
AI.practical_contributions: 为电子商务企业提供了设计用户为中心对话代理的战略见解，以增强参与度和客户忠诚度。

title: From Bits to Income: How Internet Development Enhances Rural Income Through Industrial Upgrading—Evidence from Provincial Panel Data in China
affiliations: Universiti Malaya, University of Malaya and Independent

detail.title: From Bits to Income: How Internet Development Enhances Rural Income Through Industrial Upgrading—Evidence from Provincial Panel Data in China
detail.abstract: Based on panel data from 31 Chinese provinces from 2010 to 2019, this study constructs a two-way fixed effects model and a dual mediation model to systematically evaluate how internet development affects rural household income through industrial structure upgrading. The upgrading of industrial structure is divided into two mediating paths: industrial structure rationalization (Indr), measured by the Theil index, and industrial structure upgrading (Indh), measured by the angle method of tertiary industry vectors. Empirical results indicate that internet development has a significant positive impact on rural income (p < 0.05), with Indh playing a critical mediating role (Bootstrap p < 0.01), while the Indr path is not statistically significant. Specifically, internet penetration promotes income growth by increasing the share of high-tech and modern service sectors. In contrast, improvements in resource allocation efficiency have not yet formed a stable transmission mechanism. Control variable analysis shows that regional economic level and urbanization rate also have significant positive effects on income growth. These findings confirm the structural role of the internet in advancing rural industrial transformation and income growth, offering quantitative evidence to support rural revitalization policies driven by the digital economy.

AI.tldr: 本研究基于2010-2019年中国31个省份的面板数据，通过双向固定效应模型和双重中介模型，系统评估了互联网发展如何通过产业结构升级影响农村家庭收入。研究发现互联网发展对农村收入有显著正向影响，其中产业结构高级化（Indh）是关键中介路径，而产业结构合理化（Indr）路径不显著。
AI.research_question: 互联网发展如何通过产业结构升级影响农村家庭收入？
AI.motivation: 探讨互联网发展对农村收入的影响机制，为数字经济驱动的乡村振兴政策提供量化依据。
AI.theoretical_framework: 产业结构升级理论（合理化与高级化）、互联网经济理论。
AI.method: 双向固定效应模型、双重中介模型，使用Theil指数和角度法测量产业结构升级。
AI.findings: 互联网发展显著促进农村收入增长（p < 0.05），产业结构高级化（Indh）是关键中介路径（Bootstrap p < 0.01），而产业结构合理化（Indr）路径不显著。
AI.theory_contributions: 验证了互联网在推动农村产业转型和收入增长中的结构性作用，丰富了数字经济与农村发展的理论联系。
AI.practical_contributions: 为乡村振兴政策提供了支持数字经济发展的量化证据，建议重点发展高技术和现代服务业。

reference: International Business Review, volume 32, issue 5, 2023[10.1016/j.ibusrev.2023.102167]
title: It's personal: The emotional dimension of psychic distance perception in intercultural knowledge transfer
affiliations: University of Huddersfield, University of Leeds - Division of International Business, University of Leeds - Division of International Business and University of Leeds - Faculty of Business

detail.title: It's personal: The emotional dimension of psychic distance perception in intercultural knowledge transfer
detail.abstract: Psychic distance (PD) is a perceived obstacle to information flows in knowledge transfer between individuals in different national markets. However, the impact of individuals' subjective perceptions of macro-level distance factors disrupting these flows has been undertheorized. Prior research has conceptualized PD as a geospatial concept-symmetric, continuous and stable over time. Using appraisal theory and a qualitative study of a Chinese multinational, we analyse individual-level psychic distance stimuli. We examine how perceived psychic distance is impacted in the appraisal of personal concerns, triggering salient emotions in the process of individual's cross-border interactions. Our key contribution is to trace and explain how individual-level psychic distance is created in intercultural knowledge transfer. We theorize that it is created by a psychological mechanism involving emotionally charged processes of individuals coping with concerns arising from emotional encounter. We find that conventional macro-level psychic distance is moderated by the emotions of individuals.

AI.tldr: 本文通过评估理论和定性研究，探讨了个体层面的心理距离刺激，揭示了心理距离在跨文化知识转移中的形成机制及其受情绪调节的影响。
AI.research_question: 个体层面的心理距离如何在跨文化知识转移中形成？
AI.motivation: 现有研究将心理距离视为地理空间概念，忽视了主观感知对宏观距离因素的干扰作用。
AI.theoretical_framework: 评估理论
AI.method: 定性研究（以一家中国跨国公司为例）
AI.findings: 心理距离由个体应对情感遭遇中的担忧所触发，并通过情绪调节宏观层面的心理距离。
AI.theory_contributions: 提出心理距离形成的心理机制，强调情绪在跨文化互动中的作用。
AI.practical_contributions: 为跨国企业知识转移提供个体层面的管理启示。

title: Balancing Efficiency and Consumer Experience: An Investigation of Gig vs. Traditional Customer Support
affiliations: Washington University in St. Louis - John M. Olin Business School, Washington University in St. Louis, Washington University in St. Louis - John M. Olin Business School, Fudan University - School of Management, Independent and Alibaba Group

detail.title: Balancing Efficiency and Consumer Experience: An Investigation of Gig vs. Traditional Customer Support
detail.abstract: The rise of gig economy has transformed customer support, yet rigorous evidence comparing algorithm-controlled gig workers to traditionally-supervised employees remains scarce. We conducted a large-scale field experiment at a leading e-commerce platform, randomly routing consumer inquiries to either gig or traditional agents. While gig agents excel on algorithm-monitored metrics-achieving higher closure rates and faster service-they generate more negative consumer emotions and reduce future purchases. We identify strategic case transfers as the key mechanism: gig agents transfer cases at a much higher rate, with around half of them being unnecessary escalations used to boost performance metrics. This gaming behavior simultaneously inflates efficiency metrics and degrades consumer experience, ultimately eroding trust and leading consumers to shift future purchases from high-value durable goods to low-cost consumables. Our findings reveal how algorithmic control's narrow metric focus can backfire, suggesting platforms need more nuanced performance systems that balance efficiency with unmeasured quality dimensions.

AI.tldr: 研究通过大规模实地实验比较算法控制的零工工人与传统员工在客户支持中的表现，发现零工工人虽在算法监控指标上表现优异，但引发更多负面消费者情绪并减少未来购买行为，原因是其通过策略性案例转移来操纵绩效指标。
AI.research_question: 算法控制的零工工人与传统员工在客户支持中的表现有何差异？
AI.motivation: 零工经济的兴起改变了客户支持模式，但缺乏对算法控制零工工人与传统员工的严格比较证据。
AI.theoretical_framework: 算法控制与绩效指标操纵理论。
AI.method: 在领先电商平台进行大规模实地实验，随机将消费者咨询分配给零工或传统客服。
AI.findings: 零工工人在算法监控指标（如解决率和速度）上表现更好，但引发更多负面情绪并减少未来购买；其通过高频率的策略性案例转移操纵绩效指标。
AI.theory_contributions: 揭示了算法控制的局限性，强调绩效系统需平衡效率与未测量的质量维度。
AI.practical_contributions: 为平台设计更全面的绩效系统提供建议，避免因过度关注效率指标而损害消费者体验。

title: Political Discretization and Constitutional Crisis: A Theoretical Framework for Understanding Systematic Democratic Breakdown
affiliations: Independent Scholar

detail.title: Political Discretization and Constitutional Crisis: A Theoretical Framework for Understanding Systematic Democratic Breakdown
detail.abstract: This Article introduces political discretization theory as the first systematic framework for understanding how contemporary democracies undergo breakdown through fragmentation of continuous democratic processes into controllable categorical units. Building on real-time analysis of unprecedented executive targeting of the legal profession, this research demonstrates how discrete institutional vulnerabilities interact through the "politically primordial vortex"-cascading feedback loops that create self-reinforcing cycles of democratic breakdown exponentially more difficult to reverse than prevent. Through systematic analysis of executive orders targeting law firms, resulting in nearly $1 billion in coercive settlements and unanimous judicial constitutional rejection across four federal courts, this framework establishes measurable thresholds for distinguishing constitutional emergency from normal political competition. The research demonstrates that American constitutional democracy exhibits patterns consistent with Phase 3 vortex acceleration, where normal constitutional correction mechanisms have become structurally inadequate due to gerrymandering-induced legislative capture creating "constitutional amendment impossibility." The framework reveals four discretization mechanisms operating simultaneously: geographic discretization through gerrymandering that predetermines 84% of electoral outcomes; temporal discretization restricting democratic participation to manipulable windows; institutional discretization fragmenting oversight into capturable segments; and informational discretization destroying shared epistemic foundations necessary for democratic deliberation. These mechanisms, validated through cross-national comparison and real-time constitutional crisis documentation, provide scholars and practitioners with diagnostic tools for early detection and response to systematic democratic breakdown. This research contributes to constitutional scholarship by: (1) providing systematic theory where only descriptive analysis existed; (2) establishing empirical thresholds for constitutional crisis identification; (3) demonstrating real-time validation of theoretical predictions; (4) extending constitutional coercion doctrine to private entities; and (5) creating replicable frameworks for urgent democratic defense. While requiring further validation through independent replication and longitudinal testing, the framework offers immediately applicable tools for understanding and responding to contemporary threats to constitutional governance.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了政治离散化理论，作为首个系统性框架，用于理解当代民主如何通过将连续的民主过程分解为可控的分类单元而崩溃。通过分析针对法律行业的行政命令，研究发现离散的制度漏洞通过“政治原始漩涡”相互作用，形成难以逆转的民主崩溃循环。
AI.research_question: 当代民主如何通过离散化机制崩溃？
AI.motivation: 现有研究缺乏系统性理论来解释民主崩溃的机制，本文旨在填补这一空白。
AI.theoretical_framework: 政治离散化理论，包括地理、时间、制度和信息离散化机制。

title: When Elite Impunity Meets Judicial Resolve: The Willingdon View Case and the Assertion of Rule of Law in Urban Mumbai

detail.title: When Elite Impunity Meets Judicial Resolve: The Willingdon View Case and the Assertion of Rule of Law in Urban Mumbai
detail.abstract: The case of Sunil B. Jhaveri H.U.F. v. The Municipal Commissioner, Brihan Mumbai Municipal Corporation (2025) represents a watershed moment in Indian jurisprudence concerning unauthorised construction and illegal occupation of high-rise buildings. This article examines how the Bombay High Court, subsequently endorsed by the Supreme Court, took an uncompromising stance against the unlawful occupation of a 34-storey building in prime South Mumbai that lacked fundamental safety clearances, including a Fire NOC. The judgment is particularly significant as it involved affluent occupants who had leveraged their resources to perpetuate illegality for over fifteen years. Through a detailed analysis of the legal framework, judicial reasoning, and policy implications, this article argues that the case establishes a crucial precedent that economic privilege cannot override public safety concerns and statutory compliance. The judgment's broader implications for urban governance, municipal enforcement, and the role of the judiciary in upholding the rule of law in metropolitan India are explored.

AI.tldr: 本文分析了Sunil B. Jhaveri H.U.F.诉孟买市政专员案（2025年），探讨了印度司法对高层建筑非法建设和占用的立场，强调经济特权不能凌驾于公共安全和法规合规之上。

title: The States of Thinking: Unified Metacognitive Awareness and the Evolution of Human Decision-Making Beyond Prospect Theory
affiliations: ODEFTO TECH PRIVATE LIMITED

detail.title: The States of Thinking: Unified Metacognitive Awareness and the Evolution of Human Decision-Making Beyond Prospect Theory
detail.abstract:
Prospect Theory has profoundly shaped our understanding of human decision-making under risk by distinguishing between intuitive, fast System 1 thinking and deliberate, slow System 2 reasoning. While highly influential, this dual-process framework offers a static snapshot that overlooks the broader, dynamic evolution of human cognition involved in stable, adaptive, and creative choices. Over the past century, cognitive and developmental theories—from the Four Stages of Competence and Piaget’s developmental stages to hierarchical decision-making models and psychoanalytic insights—have illuminated essential facets of human thought. However, none capture the nuanced transitions through intuitive, analytic, creative, and meta-cognitive modes essential for real-world judgment. Moreover, these models neglect how individuals develop flexible awareness needed for expertise and resilience when confronting uncertainty and risk.


Further, the dual-process models do not explain how people progress beyond System 1 and System 2 to achieve extraordinary creativity, meta-level self-regulation, or reduce Kahneman’s “noise,” the pervasive variability in judgments. Similarly, while Flow Theory identifies immersive peak states that yield profound creativity and performance, and metacognition research reveals how self-monitoring enhances decision stability, these insights remain absent from foundational economic models like Prospect Theory.


This paper synthesizes these fragmented perspectives through a novel, four-layer model of thinking that places awareness as the central driver of cognitive flexibility and decision quality. By integrating perceptual, attentional, deliberative, flow, and meta-conscious states into a unified developmental framework, we provide a comprehensive architecture that moves decision theory beyond binary dual-process limits. This integrated approach explains not only what decisions people make but why and how they evolve towards higher-order thinking and stable, creative judgment. Our model opens new avenues for research and practical interventions designed to cultivate awareness, reduce cognitive noise, and optimize decision-making in complex environments.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种新的四层思维模型，将意识作为认知灵活性和决策质量的核心驱动力，整合了感知、注意、审慎、心流和元意识状态，超越了传统的双过程理论。
AI.research_question: 如何超越传统的双过程理论（如前景理论），解释人类认知的动态演化和高阶思维（如创造力、元认知）在决策中的作用？
AI.motivation: 传统的双过程理论（如前景理论）提供了静态的决策模型，但忽视了认知的动态发展和高阶思维（如创造力、元认知）在决策中的重要性。
AI.theoretical_framework: 前景理论、心流理论、元认知研究、四阶段能力模型、皮亚杰发展阶段理论、分层决策模型。
AI.method: 提出了一种新的四层思维模型，整合了感知、注意、审慎、心流和元意识状态。
AI.findings: 该模型提供了一个全面的框架，解释了决策的动态演化和高阶思维的作用，超越了传统的双过程理论。
AI.theory_contributions: 提出了一个整合性的思维模型，填补了传统决策理论在高阶思维和动态认知发展方面的空白。
AI.practical_contributions: 为研究和实践干预提供了新方向，旨在培养意识、减少认知噪声并优化复杂环境中的决策。

title: Toward a Spinozistic Emotional Layer for AI: Modeling the Causal Anatomy of Human Emotion
affiliations: Independent

detail.title: Toward a Spinozistic Emotional Layer for AI: Modeling the Causal Anatomy of Human Emotion
detail.abstract: Modern AI systems lack emotional understanding beyond surface-level sentiment classification. They cannot grasp the cause of emotions, nor respond to their deeper logic. This paper introduces a Spinozistic Emotional Layer for AI-a system grounded in the philosophy of Baruch Spinoza that models emotions as ideational-causal activations. At its core is a dataset of Emotional Causal Pattern Units (ECPUs), formalizing human feelings as responses to the mind's interpretation of external causes. We propose a method for integrating this into Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) systems and therapeutic agents, enabling truly emotionally intelligent AI. We further define formal constructs-adequacy (α), clarity (χ), and joy delta (ΔA)-and describe their operationalization for empirical use.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种基于斯宾诺莎哲学的AI情感层（Spinozistic Emotional Layer），通过情感因果模式单元（ECPUs）建模人类情感，并将其整合到检索增强生成（RAG）系统和治疗代理中，以实现真正的情感智能。
AI.research_question: 如何让AI系统超越表面情感分类，理解情感的深层逻辑和原因？
AI.motivation: 现代AI系统缺乏对情感的深层理解，无法捕捉情感的原因或逻辑。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于斯宾诺莎哲学的情感建模，将情感视为观念-因果激活。
AI.method: 提出情感因果模式单元（ECPUs）数据集，并将其整合到RAG系统和治疗代理中。
AI.findings: 定义了形式化构造（如充足性α、清晰度χ和快乐增量ΔA），并描述了其操作化方法。
AI.theory_contributions: 提出了基于哲学的情感建模框架，为AI情感理解提供了理论基础。
AI.practical_contributions: 为RAG系统和治疗代理提供了实现情感智能的具体方法。

title: Inventory Productivity and Carbon Emissions in Retailing
affiliations: Emory University - Goizueta Business School

detail.title: Inventory Productivity and Carbon Emissions in Retailing
detail.abstract: A higher inventory productivity is thought to be associated with with lower carbon emissions and waste. We test this conventional wisdom using granular emissions data from CDP. Pairing emissions data with firms' financials, we show that most of the emission reduction benefits emerge organically with the scale of operations. Using causal inference techniques, we show that, absent the scale, an improvement in inventory productivity results in higher emission intensity in aggregate across scopes, in Scope 3, and its categories of purchased goods and services and waste from operations. The effect on Scope 1 and 2 emissions is negative. The effect is concentrated in the non-essential retail segments, excluding food and beverage, and health and personal care retailers. Thus, an implementation of lean inventory practices in non-essential retail should be undertaken cautiously, and in coordination with the upstream supply chain, because it increases carbon intensity on average, and particularly in the Scope 3 dimensions of purchased goods and services as well as waste from operations.

AI.tldr: 研究发现，库存生产率的提高在缺乏规模效应时会导致碳排放强度增加，尤其是在非必需零售领域。

AI.motivation: 验证传统观点，即高库存生产率与低碳排放和废物相关。
AI.theoretical_framework: 库存生产率与碳排放的关系，规模效应的作用。
AI.method: 使用CDP的排放数据与企业财务数据配对，采用因果推断技术。
AI.findings: 缺乏规模效应时，库存生产率提高会增加碳排放强度，尤其是在Scope 3的采购商品与服务及运营废物中。
AI.theory_contributions: 揭示了库存生产率与碳排放关系的复杂性，强调了规模效应的重要性。

title: Electric Tugboat Scheduling in Seaports
affiliations: Hong Kong Polytechnic University, affiliation not provided to SSRN, Hong Kong Polytechnic University, Hong Kong Polytechnic University and affiliation not provided to SSRN

detail.title: Electric Tugboat Scheduling in Seaports
detail.abstract: In seaports, tugboats play a critical role in assisting vessels with mooring and unmooring operations. However, conventional diesel tugboats generate substantial emissions during operations, prompting seaport operators to adopt electric alternatives. This paper studies the electric tugboat scheduling problem to simultaneously optimize the working and charging schedules of electric tugboats. The complexity of this problem arises from (i) time consistency constraints that require multiple electric tugboats to work simultaneously, (ii) service sequence constraints that establish precedence relationships between different tugging services, and (iii) nonlinear charging profiles of electric tugboats. The problem is formulated as a mixed-integer programming model. A tailored branch-and-price (BP) algorithm is developed to solve the problem efficiently. To handle the time consistency constraints and service sequence constraints that incur interdependence among schedules in the BP framework, two types of customized feasibility branching strategies are introduced. Additionally, the BP algorithm is further enhanced through an improved restricted master problem that provides tighter lower bounds and a customized bi-directional labeling algorithm that solves pricing subproblems. The performance and effectiveness of the proposed model and solution method are evaluated using numerical experiments based on operational data from a container terminal in Shanghai. The computational results demonstrate the effectiveness and efficiency of the proposed model and algorithm.

AI.tldr: 本文研究电动拖船调度问题，优化其工作和充电计划，提出混合整数规划模型和定制分支定价算法，并通过上海集装箱码头数据验证其有效性。

AI.findings: 模型和算法在解决电动拖船调度问题上表现出高效性和有效性。

title: Altruism by Choice or by Proxy: Strategic Design of Cause Marketing in E-Commerce
affiliations: Chongqing University - School of Economics and Business Admininstration, Chongqing University, Washington University in St. Louis - John M. Olin Business School and Chongqing University - School of Economics and Business Admininstration

detail.title: Altruism by Choice or by Proxy: Strategic Design of Cause Marketing in E-Commerce
detail.abstract: E-commerce platforms have increasingly embraced diverse cause marketing campaigns, adopting charitable donations as a way to incentivize transactions between sellers and consumers. A central strategic decision many platforms face is whether to take on the donation responsibility themselves (i.e., altruism by choice) or delegate it to their sellers (i.e., altruism by proxy). Motivated by this binary selection, this paper develops a game-theoretic model consisting of a platform and two competing sellers to analyze and compare the various donation strategies observed in practice. Leveraging the commission structure commonly seen in e-commerce, we demonstrate that under altruism by choice, the platform may over-donate, while under altruism by proxy, competing sellers always under-donate. Interestingly, although altruism by choice appears more costly, it could emerge as the platform's optimal strategy, particularly when the platform's commission rate is high but the consumers' prosocial level is low. Otherwise, altruism by proxy is preferred, and the platform may benefit from providing proportional commission reductions to subsidize donating sellers. We further examine the preferences of the sellers and partnering charities over various donation strategies, and propose a three-pronged framework based on our analytical results to safeguard their interests.

AI.tldr: 本文通过博弈论模型分析了电商平台在慈善捐赠中的两种策略：平台直接捐赠（选择利他）和委托卖家捐赠（代理利他）。研究发现，平台直接捐赠可能导致过度捐赠，而卖家代理捐赠则总是捐赠不足。高佣金率且消费者亲社会水平低时，平台直接捐赠更优；反之则代理捐赠更优。研究还提出了保护卖家和慈善机构利益的三重框架。
AI.research_question: 电商平台在慈善捐赠中应选择直接捐赠还是委托卖家捐赠？
AI.motivation: 实践中电商平台面临捐赠策略的二元选择，需分析哪种策略更优。
AI.theoretical_framework: 博弈论模型，分析平台与卖家在捐赠策略中的互动。
AI.method: 构建包含平台和两个竞争卖家的博弈论模型，比较不同捐赠策略的效果。
AI.findings: 平台直接捐赠可能导致过度捐赠，卖家代理捐赠则总是捐赠不足；高佣金率且低亲社会水平时，平台直接捐赠更优。
