detail.title: Sustainable Value Creation: Designing Circular Business Model for Large-Scale Carbon Mineralization
detail.abstract: This article aims to address the lack of understanding related to business model development and value creation in commercializing carbon mineralization technologies by developing a conceptual framework that incorporates sustainable value creation, business model elements, and factors related to value creation. The authors utilize qualitative thematic analysis with a deductive coding approach to extend the conceptual framework proposed in this study. The study context is a Finnish industry-academia joint research project. This study identifies sustainable value that is created and captured by different stakeholders along the value chain and recognizes key resources and capabilities that are needed in value creation processes. The study explores three core business model elements: value proposition, value creation and delivery, and value capture that influence the adoption of large-scale carbon mineralization. This study also identifies key drivers and barriers to value creation. The findings of this study suggest that a circular business model framework is essential for scaling carbon mineralization technology, which largely depends on sustainable value creation and factors influencing it. This study provides practical insights and a deeper understanding for stakeholders, managers, and developers to successfully commercialize carbon mineralization technologies. The outcome of this study is expected to benefit developers and management teams in deploying carbon mineralization projects with less effort and dispute. Existing practical research on business model development in carbon mineralization projects is limited and this study offers a framework that can be validated in a real-case setting.

AI.tldr: 本文通过构建一个结合可持续价值创造、商业模式要素和价值创造相关因素的概念框架，填补了商业化碳矿化技术在商业模式开发和价值创造方面的理解空白。研究采用定性主题分析和演绎编码方法扩展了框架，并在芬兰产学研合作项目中验证。研究发现可持续价值由价值链上的不同利益相关者创造和获取，并识别了价值创造过程中的关键资源和能力。研究还探讨了影响大规模碳矿化采用的三个核心商业模式要素：价值主张、价值创造与交付以及价值捕获，并分析了价值创造的关键驱动因素和障碍。研究结果表明，循环商业模式框架对规模化碳矿化技术至关重要，且依赖于可持续价值创造及其影响因素。研究为利益相关者、管理者和开发者提供了商业化碳矿化技术的实践见解和深入理解，有助于减少项目部署中的争议和努力。
AI.research_question: 如何通过构建商业模式框架促进碳矿化技术的商业化，并实现可持续价值创造？
AI.motivation: 现有研究对碳矿化项目中商业模式开发和价值创造的理解不足，阻碍了技术的商业化推广。
AI.theoretical_framework: 可持续价值创造理论、商业模式要素理论、价值创造相关因素理论。
AI.method: 定性主题分析结合演绎编码方法，基于芬兰产学研合作项目的案例研究。
AI.findings: 1. 可持续价值由价值链上的利益相关者共同创造和获取；2. 识别了价值创造所需的关键资源和能力；3. 三个核心商业模式要素（价值主张、价值创造与交付、价值捕获）影响碳矿化技术的采用；4. 揭示了价值创造的驱动因素和障碍。
AI.theory_contributions: 1. 扩展了商业模式框架在碳矿化技术中的应用；2. 丰富了可持续价值创造的理论理解。
AI.practical_contributions: 1. 为利益相关者提供了商业化碳矿化技术的实践指导；2. 帮助管理团队减少项目部署中的争议和努力。

title: Broken Promises, Broken Value? The Impact of Salary Adjustment Commitment on Firm Value
affiliations: National Cheng Kung University, National Taiwan University - Department of Accounting and Zhejiang Gongshang University

detail.title: Broken Promises, Broken Value? The Impact of Salary Adjustment Commitment on Firm Value
detail.abstract: This study investigates the relationship between salary adjustment commitment and firm value using a manually collected dataset of publicly listed firms in Taiwan from 2018 to 2023. We focus on the frequency of under-commitment in salary adjustments-instances where actual salary adjustments fall short of previously announced expectations. Grounded in signaling theory and prospect theory, our findings show that repeated under-commitment in salary adjustments is significantly associated with lower firm value. Mechanism analyses suggest that unmet salary commitments may undermine firm value through employee morale. Cross-sectional tests further reveal that the negative effects are particularly pronounced in firms with higher human capital intensity. Robustness checks confirm the consistency of the results when using alternative definitions of expected salary adjustments and firm value. These effects remain significant after addressing selection bias and endogeneity through Two-Stage Least Squares (2SLS), entropy balancing, and Propensity Score Matching (PSM). By shifting the focus from executive compensation to workforce-wide practices, this study positions salary adjustments as strategic governance signals. The findings offer practical implications for firms and regulators, especially in emerging markets, seeking to enhance transparency and accountability in labor-related ESG practices. Enhancing transparency and ensuring consistency between promised and actual compensation may be critical for sustaining firm value and stakeholder trust.

AI.tldr: 本研究探讨了薪资调整承诺与公司价值之间的关系，发现薪资调整的未达标行为会显著降低公司价值，尤其是在人力资本密集的公司中。
AI.research_question: 薪资调整承诺的未达标行为如何影响公司价值？
AI.motivation: 研究薪资调整承诺的实践对公司价值的影响，填补了从高管薪酬扩展到全员薪酬实践的空白。
AI.theoretical_framework: 信号理论和前景理论。
AI.method: 使用2018年至2023年台湾上市公司的数据集，采用2SLS、熵平衡和倾向得分匹配等方法解决内生性问题。
AI.findings: 薪资调整未达标行为显著降低公司价值，机制分析表明员工士气是重要渠道。
AI.theory_contributions: 将薪资调整作为战略治理信号，扩展了薪酬治理的研究视角。
AI.practical_contributions: 为公司及监管机构提供了提升薪酬透明度和一致性的实践建议，尤其是在新兴市场。

title: Studying the Role of Organizational Culture and Artificial Intelligence Integration in Business Performance
affiliations: Islamic Azad University of Najaf Abad

detail.title: Studying the Role of Organizational Culture and Artificial Intelligence Integration in Business Performance
detail.abstract: As one of the most important transformative technologies in the current era, artificial intelligence (AI) has had profound effects on the performance of businesses. While the adoption and operation of artificial intelligence provides abundant opportunities for improving processes, decision-making, and innovation, its success is strongly influenced by cultural factors within organizations. Organizational culture, as a set of shared values, beliefs, and behaviors, canIt can be a stimulus or an obstacle to the adoption of new technologies. This research has used two main methods to collect and analyze data: the comparative analytical method and the review method. In the comparative analytical method, previous studies related to organizational culture and AI integration have been reviewed and compared to determine the relationship between these two concepts. In the review method, the existing scientific and industrial research in the field of challenges and opportunities in emerging markets has been evaluated. The data used include scientific articles, industry reports, and case studies from different organizations, and tools such as Hofstede's theoretical frameworks, Technology Acceptance Model (TAM), and Levine's Change Management Model have been used to analyze the data. To analyze the data, first, the cultural factors affecting AI adoption were identified and categorized in the form of analytical tables. Then, the impact of organizational culture on various aspects of AI adoption such as innovation, risk tolerance, hierarchical structures, and employee engagement was investigated. Also, specific challenges of emerging markets such as poor infrastructure, lack of digital skills, and restrictive laws were analyzed. Quantitative Research Method: This research was conducted through interviews with the statistical population including managers and experts of information technology and human resources in different organizations. Using a structured questionnaire, the data were collected and analyzed. This approach helped to identify managers' experiences and practical opinions in the field of AI adoption and provided deeper perspectives on the existing barriers and opportunities. The main purpose of this study is to investigate the relationship between organizational culture and success in integrating AI in organizations. In particular, this research aims to identify key cultural factors that facilitate or limit AI adoption. Also, the challenges and opportunities of emerging markets in this field have been evaluated to provide practical solutions for organizations in these areas. The findings of the research show that organizations with an innovation-driven, data-driven, and highrisk tolerance culture are more successful in adopting AI. In contrast, organizations with hierarchical structures and a risk-averse culture face more challenges in this field. In emerging markets, weak infrastructure, lack of digital skills, and restrictive laws make it more difficult to adopt AI. However, employee training, reform Regulatory laws and cooperation between academia and industry can reduce these barriers. This research shows that success in AI integration is highly dependent on organizational culture. Organizations should facilitate the adoption of new technologies by promoting a culture of innovation, employee engagement, and data driven. In emerging markets, overcoming infrastructure and regulatory challenges requires extensive training strategies and collaboration.

AI.tldr: 本研究探讨了组织文化对人工智能（AI）在企业中成功整合的影响，并分析了新兴市场中的挑战与机遇。研究发现，创新驱动、数据驱动和高风险容忍度的文化有助于AI采纳，而等级结构和风险规避文化则构成障碍。新兴市场的基础设施不足、数字技能缺乏和法规限制进一步增加了挑战。
AI.research_question: 组织文化如何影响企业在人工智能（AI）整合中的成功？
AI.motivation: AI作为当前时代的重要变革技术，其成功采纳受组织文化影响显著。研究旨在揭示文化因素如何促进或阻碍AI整合，并为新兴市场提供解决方案。
AI.theoretical_framework: 研究采用了Hofstede文化理论框架、技术接受模型（TAM）和Levine变革管理模型。
AI.method: 结合比较分析法和文献综述法，分析科学文献、行业报告和案例研究；通过问卷调查和访谈收集定量数据。
AI.findings: 创新驱动、数据驱动和高风险容忍度的文化促进AI采纳；等级结构和风险规避文化则构成障碍。新兴市场的基础设施和法规问题进一步增加挑战。
AI.theory_contributions: 揭示了组织文化与AI采纳之间的具体关系，扩展了文化理论和变革管理理论的应用。
AI.practical_contributions: 为企业提供了优化组织文化以促进AI整合的实践建议，并为新兴市场提出了培训、法规改革和产学研合作的解决方案。

title: Seeing is Believing? Popularity Manipulation in Live-Streaming Reward
affiliations: Northeastern University - School of Business Administration, University of Texas at Dallas - Naveen Jindal School of Management, University of Texas at Dallas - Naveen Jindal School of Management and Northeastern University - School of Business Administration, Department of Information Management and Decision Sciences

detail.title: Seeing is Believing? Popularity Manipulation in Live-Streaming Reward
detail.abstract: Gift-rewarding has grown into a business model extracting considerable revenue in the live-streaming industry. Influencers on live-streaming platforms rely on their popularity to attract viewers to free watch their shows and embrace virtual gifts voluntarily rewarded by the viewers. However, to boost potential rewarded gifts, many influencers manipulate their popularity to tempt viewers into their live-streaming rooms, posing a severe challenge to reputation and revenue of the platforms. This paper develops a game-theoretic model in an ecosystem consisting of a live-streaming platform and two competitive influencers with differentiated inherent abilities to explore the influencers’ incentives to manipulate their popularity and evaluate the effectiveness of platform detection in combating popularity manipulation. We find that the low-ability influencer has incentives to engage in popularity manipulation unless the real popularity difference between both influencers is large enough. Within this context, the low-ability influencer offensively conducts popularity manipulation if their real popularity difference is extremely small and the high-ability influencer defensively does that otherwise. Additionally, popularity manipulation increases efforts in self-improvement of the low-ability influencer but decreases those of the high-ability influencer. Interestingly, the platform does not always have incentives to detect popularity manipulation and its detection may backfire and jeopardize viewer welfare and social welfare due to removal of the high-ability influencer falling in violation. To mitigate the inefficiency of platform detection, we further propose a low-popularity-influencer-friendly commission policy that can be used as a complement or substitute tool for platform detection to combat popularity manipulation and may Pareto improve the social welfare.

AI.tldr: 本文通过博弈论模型研究了直播平台中低能力主播操纵人气的动机及平台检测的有效性，发现低能力主播在人气差异较小时会操纵人气，而平台检测可能适得其反。提出了一种低人气主播友好的佣金政策作为解决方案。
AI.research_question: 直播平台中竞争主播操纵人气的动机是什么？平台检测对操纵行为的有效性如何？
AI.motivation: 直播行业中礼物打赏成为重要收入来源，但主播操纵人气行为损害平台声誉和收入，需研究其动机及应对策略。
AI.theoretical_framework: 博弈论模型，分析平台与两位能力不同的主播之间的互动。
AI.method: 构建博弈论模型，模拟主播操纵人气的动机及平台检测的效果。
AI.findings: 低能力主播在人气差异较小时会操纵人气；平台检测可能适得其反，损害高能力主播和观众福利。
AI.theory_contributions: 揭示了主播操纵人气的动机及平台检测的局限性，丰富了直播行业的经济学研究。
AI.practical_contributions: 提出低人气主播友好的佣金政策，可作为平台检测的补充或替代方案，提升社会福利。

title: A Digital Twin Architecture for the Provisioning of Heterogeneous Iot Devices
affiliations: Stellenbosch University, Stellenbosch University and Stellenbosch University

detail.title: A Digital Twin Architecture for the Provisioning of Heterogeneous Iot Devices
detail.abstract: As IoT ecosystems expand in scale and complexity, enterprises face challenges in managing the provisioning of heterogeneous IoT devices with varying capabilities, protocols, and onboarding requirements. Provisioning, a necessary step in the IoT device life cycle, enables unique identity assignment, network connectivity, and service authorization. However, IoT systems currently reported in the literature often rely on vendor-specific tools or lack scalability and modifiability, which are required to support the current diversity of devices. To address these limitations, this paper presents a digital twin system architecture for the provisioning of heterogeneous IoT devices. The architecture presented here is designed to support diverse IoT device types, each with unique provisioning requirements, while enabling efficient provisioning on an enterprise scale. The architecture enables interoperability with diverse device communication protocols, provisioning methods, and characteristics. By integrating, as is typical for digital twins, the IoT device’s representation with decision-making and control capabilities, the digital twin system acts as a contextually aware orchestrator. Using a proof-of-concept implementation, the paper demonstrates the modifiability of the architecture by supporting both request/response (gRPC) and publish/subscribe (MQTT) communication patterns. The proof-of-concept implementation also exhibits scalability, simultaneously provisioning up to 200 representative IoT devices with minimal impact on the provisioning interval. While the system shows promise in modifiability, further optimizations are required to reduce complexity when adapting to new onboarding and provisioning processes.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种基于数字孪生的异构物联网设备配置系统架构，解决了现有方法在可扩展性和可修改性上的不足，支持多种设备类型和通信协议。
AI.research_question: 如何设计一个可扩展且可修改的系统架构，以支持异构物联网设备的配置？
AI.motivation: 随着物联网生态系统的规模和复杂性增加，现有配置工具缺乏通用性和可扩展性，无法满足多样化设备的需求。
AI.theoretical_framework: 数字孪生技术、异构设备配置理论。
AI.method: 提出了一种数字孪生系统架构，并通过概念验证实现（支持gRPC和MQTT通信模式）验证其可修改性和可扩展性。
AI.findings: 系统支持同时配置200个代表性物联网设备，且对配置间隔影响最小，但在适应新配置流程时仍需进一步优化以减少复杂性。
AI.theory_contributions: 扩展了数字孪生技术在物联网设备配置中的应用，提出了支持异构设备的通用架构。
AI.practical_contributions: 为企业提供了一种可扩展且灵活的物联网设备配置解决方案，支持多种通信协议和设备类型。

title: Digital Transformation and Human Resource Management in Higher Education: A Study of Transformational Practices in Faridabad's Educational Institutions
affiliations: K R Mangalam University, K R Mangalam University and K.R. Mangalam University

detail.title: Digital Transformation and Human Resource Management in Higher Education: A Study of Transformational Practices in Faridabad's Educational Institutions
detail.abstract: This study examines the impact of digital transformation on Human Resource Management (HRM) practices within higher education institutions (HEIs) in Faridabad, India. Grounded in the Theory of Planned Behaviour (TPB), Technology Acceptance Model (TAM), and Diffusion of Innovation (DOI), it explores adoption patterns, challenges, and enablers of digital HR tools. A structured quantitative methodology was used, surveying HR professionals and faculty members. Key constructs—perceived usefulness (PU), perceived ease of use (PEOU), relative advantage (RA), social influence (SI), and facilitating conditions (FC)—were analyzed using Structural Equation Modeling (SEM). The findings reveal that PU, PEOU, RA, and SI significantly affect digital HRM adoption, with barriers including budget constraints and skill gaps. Practical recommendations include leadership support, digital training, and infrastructure improvement. This research contributes to the localized understanding of digital HRM in Indian HEIs, offering both theoretical insights and practical implementation strategies.

AI.tldr: 本研究探讨了数字化对印度Faridabad高等教育机构人力资源管理（HRM）实践的影响，基于计划行为理论（TPB）、技术接受模型（TAM）和创新扩散理论（DOI），分析了数字HR工具的采用模式、挑战和推动因素。
AI.research_question: 数字化如何影响印度Faridabad高等教育机构的人力资源管理实践？
AI.motivation: 研究旨在填补数字化HRM在印度高等教育机构中的本地化研究空白，并为实践提供指导。
AI.theoretical_framework: 计划行为理论（TPB）、技术接受模型（TAM）和创新扩散理论（DOI）。
AI.method: 采用结构化定量方法，调查HR专业人员和教职员工，使用结构方程模型（SEM）分析关键变量。
AI.findings: 感知有用性（PU）、感知易用性（PEOU）、相对优势（RA）和社会影响（SI）显著影响数字HRM的采用，而预算限制和技能差距是主要障碍。
AI.theory_contributions: 为数字化HRM在印度高等教育机构中的本地化研究提供了理论支持。
AI.practical_contributions: 提出了领导支持、数字培训和基础设施改进等实践建议。

title: Sustainable Leadership Practices of Pakistani Female Leaders
affiliations: Lancaster University, University of Central Lancashire and University of Central Lancashire

detail.title: Sustainable Leadership Practices of Pakistani Female Leaders
detail.abstract: The purpose of this study was to explore the experiences of female leaders in Pakistan regarding sustainability leadership, as well as their personal perceptions and approaches. According to UN Women and UNDP’s reports, Pakistan is in a complex situation in terms of sustainability, with high climate vulnerability and low gender equality, which requires extra attention in the sustainability literature. Avery and Bergsteiner’s Honeybee and Locust sustainable leadership framework was used as the theoretical framework for this purpose. A total of fifteen semi-structured interviews were conducted with female leaders from a variety of sectors, including corporate finance, tourism, academia, development, and small business enterprises. Overall, the findings revealed that female leaders in Pakistan had a strong commitment to sustainable organisational practices, which aligned with the Honeybee Leadership style, even in the absence of systemic institutional support.

AI.tldr: 本研究探讨了巴基斯坦女性领导者在可持续领导力方面的经验、个人认知及方法，发现她们在缺乏系统性支持的情况下仍表现出强烈的可持续组织实践承诺。
AI.research_question: 巴基斯坦女性领导者在可持续领导力方面的经验、认知及方法是什么？
AI.motivation: 根据联合国妇女署和开发计划署的报告，巴基斯坦在可持续性方面面临复杂挑战（高气候脆弱性和低性别平等），需更多关注。
AI.theoretical_framework: Avery和Bergsteiner的Honeybee和Locust可持续领导力框架。
AI.method: 对15位来自不同行业（企业金融、旅游、学术、发展和小型企业）的女性领导者进行半结构化访谈。
AI.findings: 巴基斯坦女性领导者表现出对可持续组织实践的强烈承诺，符合Honeybee领导风格，尽管缺乏系统性支持。
AI.theory_contributions: 丰富了可持续领导力理论，特别是在性别和地域背景下的应用。
AI.practical_contributions: 为巴基斯坦及其他类似背景国家的组织提供了女性领导者在可持续实践中的经验和启示。

title: "Tough It Out": An Investigation on the Societal Pressure to Persevere
affiliations: University of Minnesota

detail.title: "Tough It Out": An Investigation on the Societal Pressure to Persevere
detail.abstract: Social pressures often manifest in the belief that one must 'power through' adversity when they encounter it. In a world where 45% of Americans report they did not seek professional help for clinical mental health issues and 22% of those reported that they did not take the first step to receiving care because they were afraid of how others around them would react to the information, it has become clear that societal pressures do more than just ascribe certain roles to individuals; they erode the struggles that individuals confront. This paper explores three empirical ways in which the pressure to persevere corrodes mental health: suppressing vulnerability, lowering self-esteem, and placing an importance on an individual's role in society over their well-being. In a society that values individual freedom over community, the mindset of isolating an individual from their community and support system through placing an extreme amount of external pressure can be particularly dangerous. Indeed, this issue is only exemplified when society forces citizens to 'tough out' their mental battles, encouraging them to rebound through their ambition instead of supplying them with the proper resources and help that they need.

AI.tldr: 本文探讨了社会压力如何通过压制脆弱性、降低自尊和强调社会角色而非个人福祉，损害心理健康。
AI.research_question: 社会压力如何通过‘坚持到底’的观念损害心理健康？
AI.motivation: 45%的美国人未寻求心理健康专业帮助，22%因担心他人反应而未采取行动，突显社会压力对心理健康的负面影响。
AI.theoretical_framework: 社会压力理论、心理健康与自我认同的关系。
AI.method: 通过实证分析探讨社会压力对心理健康的三种具体影响。
AI.findings: 社会压力通过压制脆弱性、降低自尊和强调社会角色，显著损害心理健康。
AI.theory_contributions: 扩展了社会压力对心理健康影响的理论框架，揭示了‘坚持到底’观念的负面效应。
AI.practical_contributions: 呼吁社会减少对‘坚持到底’的推崇，提供更多心理健康支持资源。

title: Local vs Global Effects of the Or's Spatial Network on Total Operative Times at a Military Medical Center
affiliations: CannonDesign, affiliation not provided to SSRN, University of Utah and affiliation not provided to SSRN

detail.title: Local vs Global Effects of the Or's Spatial Network on Total Operative Times at a Military Medical Center
detail.abstract: Total operative times are critical indicators of operating room (OR) performance. Prior research has examined factors like scheduling and disruptions, but has understudied spatial layouts. We examine the association between OR layout and total operative times (TOT) using data on 14,515 surgical procedures performed between 2019-2023 at a U.S. military medical center. We use network analysis and ordinary least squares (OLS) linear regressions to model the relationship between log-transformed TOT, harmonic mean depth (HMD) and betweenness (BETW). HMD captures the accessibility of spaces in their neighborhoods. BETW measures the extent spaces are on the shortest paths between other space-pairs. HMD is significantly correlated with TOT, controlling for surgical complexity, case order and surgical specialty, and is 2.63 times (absolute β) more influential than BETW, which is not significantly associated with TOT. Design interventions targeting the local aspects of the OR's layout could improve surgical workflows, patient safety, and staff performance.

AI.tldr: 本研究探讨了手术室（OR）布局与总手术时间（TOT）的关系，发现局部空间可达性（HMD）显著影响TOT，而全局路径中心性（BETW）无显著影响。
AI.research_question: 手术室的空间布局如何影响总手术时间？
AI.motivation: 以往研究关注调度和干扰，但忽视了空间布局对手术时间的影响。
AI.theoretical_framework: 网络分析理论，包括局部空间可达性（HMD）和全局路径中心性（BETW）。
AI.method: 使用网络分析和OLS线性回归分析14,515例手术数据。
AI.findings: HMD与TOT显著相关，且影响程度是BETW的2.63倍；BETW无显著关联。
AI.theory_contributions: 扩展了手术室绩效的理论框架，强调局部空间布局的重要性。
AI.practical_contributions: 为手术室设计提供优化建议，以提升工作流程、患者安全和员工表现。

title: Development of a Software Architecture to Support the Flexibility-Based Distribution System Planning
affiliations: affiliation not provided to SSRN, RWTH Aachen University and affiliation not provided to SSRN

detail.title: Development of a Software Architecture to Support the Flexibility-Based Distribution System Planning
detail.abstract: The increasing integration of Renewable Energy Sources (RES) and Distributed Energy Resources (DER) in distribution networks introduces new challenges related to voltage stability and congestion. Traditional deterministic planning methods are proving inadequate, prompting a shift toward adaptive, flexibility-based approaches. This paper presents an innovative software architecture to evaluate the role of local flexibility in mitigating congestion and optimizing grid operations. The framework integrates a stochastic scenario generator and an enhanced Optimal Power Flow (OPF) algorithm to quantify flexibility contributions in urban and rural networks. By applying Monte Carlo simulations, the platform captures uncertainties in load and generation growth, offering a probabilistic approach to grid planning.Two flexibility strategies—“desired power exchange” and “zero power exchange”—are assessed for their effectiveness in deferring grid reinforcements and improving operational stability. Simulation results indicate that local flexibility can sufficiently address congestion in future scenarios. The modular design of the platform ensures adaptability to various simulation requirements and network conditions. However, challenges such as OPF convergence and computational efficiency persist, particularly in highly congested contexts.Future research will focus on enhancing optimization methodologies, incorporating voltage compensation mechanisms, and exploring advanced techniques like Genetic Algorithm-based OPF models. The approach aligns with European regulatory directives supporting transparency and efficiency in grid planning. By enabling decentralized and responsive grid management, the proposed architecture offers a scalable and valuable tool for Distribution System Operators (DSOs), supporting the development of sustainable, resilient power distribution networks.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种创新的软件架构，用于评估本地灵活性在缓解电网拥堵和优化电网运营中的作用。通过随机场景生成器和优化的最优潮流算法，结合蒙特卡洛模拟，量化了灵活性的贡献。结果表明，本地灵活性可以有效应对未来场景中的拥堵问题。
AI.research_question: 如何利用本地灵活性缓解电网拥堵并优化电网运营？
AI.motivation: 随着可再生能源和分布式能源在配电网中的集成增加，传统确定性规划方法已显不足，需要转向基于灵活性的自适应方法。
AI.theoretical_framework: 本文基于最优潮流算法和蒙特卡洛模拟，结合随机场景生成器，构建了一个评估灵活性的理论框架。
AI.method: 采用随机场景生成器和优化的最优潮流算法，结合蒙特卡洛模拟，量化灵活性在城乡电网中的贡献。
AI.findings: 模拟结果表明，本地灵活性可以有效缓解未来场景中的电网拥堵问题。
AI.theory_contributions: 提出了一个创新的软件架构，为电网规划提供了一种概率性方法，并量化了灵活性的作用。
AI.practical_contributions: 为配电网运营商提供了一个可扩展的工具，支持可持续和弹性的电网发展，符合欧洲监管要求。

title: Redefining the Management Accountant: Professional Identity and Skills in the Era of Sustainability Integration
affiliations: affiliation not provided to SSRN, affiliation not provided to SSRN, affiliation not provided to SSRN and affiliation not provided to SSRN

detail.title: Redefining the Management Accountant: Professional Identity and Skills in the Era of Sustainability Integration
detail.abstract: This study examines how management accountants’ professional identities and skillsets are being redefined in response to the integration of sustainability within organizational control systems. Drawing on in-depth qualitative interviews with accountants, sustainability managers, and consultants in Sweden, Germany, and the Netherlands, the study explores the complex interplay of regulatory change, technological innovation, and evolving organizational expectations. The findings reveal that management accountants are increasingly adopting hybrid roles, acting as translators between financial and sustainability logics and developing new competencies in digitalization and cross-boundary collaboration. Jurisdictional boundaries are shown to be fluid and contested, shaped by both internal adaptation and external interventions. The study demonstrates that professional transformation is neither linear nor uniform, but is characterized by negotiation, ambiguity, and ongoing contestation. By synthesizing multiple theoretical perspectives, our study provides new insights into the drivers and dynamics of professional change at the sustainability frontier. The study concludes with practical recommendations for organizations and educators and calls for further research on the durability and evolution of hybrid professional roles in the context of sustainable business transformation.

AI.tldr: 本研究探讨了管理会计师在可持续发展融入组织控制系统时如何重新定义其职业身份和技能。通过定性访谈，研究发现会计师正扮演混合角色，成为财务与可持续发展逻辑的桥梁，并发展数字化和跨边界协作能力。
AI.research_question: 管理会计师的职业身份和技能如何因可持续发展融入组织控制系统而重新定义？
AI.motivation: 探讨可持续发展背景下管理会计师角色的变化及其驱动因素。
AI.theoretical_framework: 结合多理论视角，分析职业变革的驱动因素和动态。
AI.method: 对瑞典、德国和荷兰的会计师、可持续发展经理和顾问进行深度定性访谈。
AI.findings: 管理会计师逐渐承担混合角色，成为财务与可持续发展逻辑的翻译者，并发展新技能。职业变革具有非线性和多样性。
AI.theory_contributions: 为职业变革的驱动因素和动态提供了新见解。
AI.practical_contributions: 为组织和教育者提供了实践建议，并呼吁进一步研究混合角色的持久性和演变。

title: Integration of Energy Hubs and Internet Data Centers with High Penetration of Energy Storage Systems into Distribution- and Transmission-Level Congestion Markets
affiliations: affiliation not provided to SSRN, affiliation not provided to SSRN, Islamic Azad University (IAU) - Renewable Energy Research Center and affiliation not provided to SSRN

detail.title: Integration of Energy Hubs and Internet Data Centers with High Penetration of Energy Storage Systems into Distribution- and Transmission-Level Congestion Markets
detail.abstract: Smart prosumers with renewable generation resources and energy storage systems possess significant potential to provide cost-effective network services, making their integration into modern power systems increasingly critical for system operators. Hence, this paper presents a comprehensive three-layer methodology aimed at maximizing the potential of smart prosumers, particularly energy hubs and internet data centers, in delivering network services. In the first layer, energy storage-rich energy hubs and internet data centers determine their maximum available downward capacities in a decentralized manner and submit these to distribution-level congestion management markets. The second layer involves Distribution System Operators (DSOs) independently settling their local congestion management markets and offering the remaining downstream capacities to the upstream transmission-level congestion management market. In the third layer, the Transmission System Operator (TSO) settles transmission-level congestion management market, incorporating the downward capacities received from distribution systems. The proposed method is applied to a system, comprising a 14-bus transmission system coupled with eight 15-bus distribution systems, using GAMS for implementation. Simulation results demonstrate that the proposed methodology successfully releases the maximum available downward capacities of energy hubs and internet data centers in both transmission and distribution-level congestion management markets. This release not only offers significant benefits to these smart prosumers but also reduces congestion management costs by 22.6% and 29.25% for DSOs and the TSO, respectively. The results confirm significant impact of energy storage systems.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种三层方法，旨在最大化智能产消者（如能源枢纽和互联网数据中心）在电力系统中的网络服务潜力，显著降低了拥堵管理成本。
AI.research_question: 如何最大化智能产消者在电力系统中提供网络服务的潜力？
AI.motivation: 智能产消者具备可再生能源和储能系统，能够为电力系统提供经济高效的网络服务，但其潜力尚未充分释放。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于分散式容量管理和多层级拥堵管理市场的理论框架。
AI.method: 提出三层方法：1）智能产消者确定并提交可用容量；2）DSOs独立解决本地拥堵市场；3）TSO整合下游容量解决传输级拥堵市场。
AI.findings: 方法成功释放了智能产消者的最大可用容量，降低DSOs和TSO的拥堵管理成本分别为22.6%和29.25%。
AI.theory_contributions: 提出了分散式容量管理与多层级市场整合的理论框架。
AI.practical_contributions: 显著降低拥堵管理成本，验证了储能系统在电力系统中的重要作用。

title: A Metaheuristic Algorithm for Locomotive Rescheduling in Freight Transportation Under Disruptions
affiliations: University of Udine, University of Bologna and affiliation not provided to SSRN

detail.title: A Metaheuristic Algorithm for Locomotive Rescheduling in Freight Transportation Under Disruptions
detail.abstract: We address a Locomotive Rescheduling Problem (LResP) in the context of rail freight transportation in the event of disruptions. The main objective consists of minimizing trip cancellations and deviations from the original plan, while fulfilling locomotives' availability and maintenance constraints. The studied LResP features severe disruptions lasting more than one day and a weekly rescheduling horizon.   To solve LResP, we adapt a Mixed Integer Linear Programming (MILP) formulation originally proposed in the literature for the planning problem by including a new objective function and additional constraints required for the rescheduling setting. Although good quality solutions for small-scale instances are obtained by solving the MILP model with a general-purpose solver, to tackle larger-scale instances with additional real-life constraints in short computing times, we design a Multi-Neighborhood Search metaheuristic (MNS). It effectively combines both traditional and problem-tailored neighborhoods. In addition, it relies on stochastic exploration and uses a simulated annealing scheme to guide the search. We tested the proposed approaches on instances from a real-world setting of the Austrian railways. While the MILP model obtains a few optimal solutions for small-scale instances, MNS demonstrates both fast and scalable, obtaining good quality solutions on instances with thousands trips, thus highlighting its reliability and applicability in real-world scenarios.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了铁路货运中因严重中断导致的机车重调度问题（LResP），旨在最小化行程取消和计划偏差。通过改进的混合整数线性规划（MILP）和多邻域搜索元启发式（MNS）方法，解决了小规模和大规模实例的调度问题，并在奥地利铁路的实际案例中验证了其有效性。
AI.research_question: 如何在严重中断和长期调度周期下，优化铁路货运机车的重调度问题，以最小化行程取消和计划偏差？
AI.motivation: 铁路货运中的中断可能导致严重的运营问题，需要高效的机车重调度方法以减少损失并满足维护约束。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于混合整数线性规划（MILP）和多邻域搜索元启发式（MNS）的理论框架。
AI.method: 改进的MILP模型用于小规模实例；设计MNS方法（结合传统和定制邻域、随机探索和模拟退火）用于大规模实例。
AI.findings: MILP在小规模实例中可得到最优解；MNS在大规模实例中表现快速且可扩展，适用于实际场景。
AI.theory_contributions: 扩展了MILP在重调度问题中的应用，并提出了高效的MNS元启发式方法。
AI.practical_contributions: 为铁路货运公司提供了实用的重调度工具，可显著减少中断带来的运营损失。

title: Machine Learning Surrogate Models for Hertzian Contact Stress Prediction in Gear Design: A Comparative Study of Multiple Approaches
affiliations: Politecnico di Torino, Politecnico di Torino and Politecnico di Torino

detail.title: Machine Learning Surrogate Models for Hertzian Contact Stress Prediction in Gear Design: A Comparative Study of Multiple Approaches
detail.abstract: Accurately predicting contact stress in gears is essential for ensuring durability and optimizing performance during the design stage. This study investigates machine learning surrogate models for predicting Hertzian contact stress in involute gear pairs, aiming to accelerate the gear design process. Unlike approaches based on finite element simulations or experimental data, the proposed method relies solely on stress values from ISO 6336 formulations. A comprehensive dataset covering various macro geometries and loading conditions is used to train and evaluate several regression models, including Elastic Net, Support Vector Regressor, ensemble methods, and Neural Networks. To improve computational efficiency and address the high dimensionality of the input space, Principal Component Analysis is explored as a dimensionality reduction technique. The study provides a detailed comparison of surrogate modeling approaches based on predictive accuracy and generalization. Results show that surrogate models can accurately reproduce ISO based predictions, offering a faster alternative to traditional methods. Focusing on Hertzian stress, rather than root stress, offers deeper insight into surface fatigue and pitting resistance for gear life improvement. This work establishes the foundation for future surrogate models that optimize gear pairs by balancing multiple design objectives and constraints, aiding engineers in selecting optimal configurations.

AI.tldr: 本研究探讨了机器学习替代模型在预测渐开线齿轮副赫兹接触应力中的应用，旨在加速齿轮设计过程。通过基于ISO 6336公式的应力值，训练和评估多种回归模型，结果表明替代模型能准确复现ISO预测，为齿轮设计提供高效替代方案。
AI.research_question: 如何利用机器学习替代模型高效预测渐开线齿轮副的赫兹接触应力？
AI.motivation: 在齿轮设计阶段准确预测接触应力对确保耐久性和优化性能至关重要，传统方法如有限元模拟或实验数据耗时且复杂。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于ISO 6336公式的应力计算理论及机器学习回归模型（如Elastic Net、支持向量回归、集成方法和神经网络）。
AI.method: 使用涵盖多种宏观几何形状和载荷条件的综合数据集训练回归模型，并探索主成分分析以降低输入空间维度。
AI.findings: 替代模型能准确复现ISO预测结果，为齿轮设计提供更快速的方法。
AI.theory_contributions: 为齿轮设计领域引入机器学习替代模型的理论基础，扩展了传统应力预测方法的适用范围。
AI.practical_contributions: 为工程师提供了一种高效的工具，优化齿轮设计配置，提升表面疲劳和抗点蚀性能。

title: Optimal Sample Definition: Towards Model Validation of Products with Large Parameter Space in Volume Production
affiliations: affiliation not provided to SSRN, affiliation not provided to SSRN, affiliation not provided to SSRN and affiliation not provided to SSRN

detail.title: Optimal Sample Definition: Towards Model Validation of Products with Large Parameter Space in Volume Production
detail.abstract: In safety-relevant industry applications, e.g., automated driving, the ensurance of safety goals through-out an entire design domain is crucial. In the automotive industry, the safety of intended functionallity (SOTIF) is a common industry standard. In practice, providing a proof of SOTIF based solely on real-world tests is often economically unfeasible. This has lead to an increasing demand for simulation-based testing methods. Switching from real-world to simulative testing, the simulation model’s credibility is of utmost importance within the entire simulation domain. A key question here arises: How do we chose a (small) number of physical samples to validate our simulation model that covers a maximum of the (parameter) domain?The authors propose a sample definition algorithm grounded in system theory to maximize representativeness of this (small) number of prototypes, while minimizing prototype count. This facilitates efficient validation, addressing practical constraints in prototype testing, such as cost and time, thus enhancing model credibility and robustness across automotive and aerospace sectors. The paper demonstrates the applicability of this framework through academic and industrial case studies, establishing a systematic path towards credible simulation.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种基于系统理论的样本定义算法，旨在通过最小化原型数量最大化参数域覆盖，从而高效验证仿真模型的可信度。
AI.research_question: 如何在有限的物理样本数量下选择最具代表性的样本，以验证仿真模型在整个参数域的可信度？
AI.motivation: 在安全关键行业（如自动驾驶）中，仅依赖实际测试验证SOTIF标准经济上不可行，因此需要高效的仿真测试方法。
AI.theoretical_framework: 系统理论
AI.method: 提出一种样本定义算法，通过优化样本选择最大化参数域覆盖，同时最小化原型数量。
AI.findings: 通过学术和工业案例研究验证了该框架的适用性，为仿真模型的可信度验证提供了系统化路径。
AI.theory_contributions: 为仿真模型验证提供了一种基于系统理论的理论框架，优化了样本选择策略。
AI.practical_contributions: 解决了原型测试中的成本和实践限制，提升了仿真模型在汽车和航空航天领域的可信度和鲁棒性。

title: Leadership Style, Employee Confidence, and Conflict Management: A Comparative Analysis of Family and Non-Family Enterprises
affiliations: Banaras Hindu University

detail.title: Leadership Style, Employee Confidence, and Conflict Management: A Comparative Analysis of Family and Non-Family Enterprises
detail.abstract: Laissez faire leadership (LFL) has been associated with ineffective methods of conflict management; however, the extent to which LFL can elucidate the adoption of more effective strategies (such as problem-solving) remains unexplored. This lack of investigation is unexpected, considering that trust in subordinates is a hallmark of LFL, which is essential for fostering cooperative relationships that involve problem-solving. Additionally, in contrast to non-family businesses (NFBs), the socioemotional wealth that influences decision-making in family businesses (FBs) should render LFL, along with trust in subordinates and the application of problem-solving, more prevalent in the latter. In this research, we examine the implementation of LFL in FBs compared to NFBs and investigate whether trust in subordinates underpins a positive correlation between LFL and the utilization of this approach, as well as whether the unique socioemotional wealth of FBs accounts for variations in this relationship. Utilizing a sample of 326 general managers from small and medium-sized enterprises (SMEs) in Ecuador, two complementary methodologies partial least squares (PLS) and fuzzy-set qualitative comparative analysis (fs/QCA) produced robust results. As anticipated, variations in the intensity of this relationship were observed between FBs and NFBs, with LFL and both affective and cognitive trust being pivotal for the implementation of problem-solving in FBs, whereas cognitive trust assumed this primary role in NFBs. Our results bridge the largely distinct literature on leadership and conflict management within the context of FBs.

AI.tldr: 本文探讨了放任型领导（LFL）在家族企业（FBs）与非家族企业（NFBs）中的实施差异，发现信任在LFL与问题解决策略之间起关键作用，且家族企业的社会情感财富强化了这种关系。
AI.research_question: 放任型领导（LFL）如何影响家族企业与非家族企业中问题解决策略的采用？信任和社会情感财富在此关系中扮演什么角色？
AI.motivation: 尽管LFL被认为与无效冲突管理相关，但其在促进问题解决策略中的作用尚未被充分研究，尤其是在家族企业中。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于信任理论和社会情感财富理论，探讨LFL与问题解决策略的关系。
AI.method: 采用偏最小二乘法（PLS）和模糊集定性比较分析（fs/QCA），分析326名厄瓜多尔中小企业总经理的数据。
AI.findings: LFL和情感/认知信任在家族企业中更显著促进问题解决，而非家族企业中仅认知信任起主要作用。
AI.theory_contributions: 填补了领导力与冲突管理在家族企业背景下的研究空白，强调了社会情感财富的调节作用。
AI.practical_contributions: 为家族企业管理者提供了通过信任和LFL优化冲突管理策略的实践启示。
